T02D1347-1:111a-28: chu shing gi ni 'bras bu smin pa dang //
T02D1347-1:111a-29: chu shing nyams pas yang dag 'byung ba bzhin //

T02D1347-1:111a-41: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1347-1:111a-42: snying rje dang ni stong nyid sku //
T02D1347-1:111b-0: dus ni kun rdzob @111b gzugs can ma //

T02D1347-1:111b-21: lag pas bcing ba byas nas so yi rtse mo

T02D1347-1:111b-24: dran pa de yi lus ni gtong bar byed //

T02D1347-1:111b-26: grong dang dgon pa dus gcig sreg cing skar mda' ltung ba bzhin du me stag 'phro bar byed //

T02D1347-1:112a-3: khros shing mig sman sngon po'i mdog dang 'khyog por bgrod pa'i lus can drag po'i phat sgra sgrogs //

T02D1347-1:112b-1: 'phrog dran pa de la srung ba byed par 'gyur

T02D1347-1:113a-5: ba nyid 'gyur slar yang skye ba ldan pa min

T02D1347-1:139a-40: thams cad mkhyen pa gang yin pa de nyid ye shes sku ma yin nam /
T02D1347-1:139b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes sku zhes zlos pa ci'i don du @139b gsungs she na /

T02D1347-1:140b-0: @140b bzhin du rigs brgya ring ba'i ngo bo nyid

T02D1347-1:140b-17: yang seng ge'i khri ni zla ba dang nyi ma

T02D1347-1:141a-7: las 'das pa'i chos ston pa po gzhan ni 'ga'
T02D1347-1:141a-8: mkhyen pa ste / yang med do / gang gi
T02D1347-1:141a-9: phyir lha'i skye ba gcig pu nyi tshe bar skyes

T02D1347-1:141a-14: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ston

T02D1347-1:141a-17: ba'i skad kyis bstan pa glu dang grub pa'i mtha'
T02D1347-1:141a-18: dang sngon rabs kyi chos thams cad nyi tshe bar

T02D1347-1:141a-25: gyi rabs kyi chos rnams bram ze'i kha las bram

T02D1347-1:150b-48: dbyangs dang gsal byed 'di dag gi yang thung ngu dang ring po'i dbye bas phung po dang /
T02D1347-1:150b-49: khams la sogs pa'i dbye ba shes par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-1: dbye bas phung po dang dbang po ni dbyangs dang
T02D1347-1:151a-2: gsal byed thung ngu'i chos rnams yin la khams dang
T02D1347-1:151a-3: yul ni dbyangs dang gsal byed ring po'i chos rnams
T02D1347-1:151a-4: so // ro drug dang khams kyi rnam par 'gyur
T02D1347-1:151a-5: ba'i dbye bas khams sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur
T02D1347-1:151a-6: so // ba dang / phung po drug dbang po
T02D1347-1:151a-7: drug gi dbye bas phung po sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1347-1:151a-9: ro drug dang khams drug dang dbang po drug dang
T02D1347-1:151a-10: yul drug dang las kyi dbang po drug dang las
T02D1347-1:151a-11: kyi dbang po'i yul [?] drug ni ro drug dang
T02D1347-1:151a-13: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa drug dang /
T02D1347-1:151a-14: de bzhin du 'du byed drug dang tshor ba drug dang /
T02D1347-1:151a-15: 'du shes drug dang gzugs kyi phung po drug dang /
T02D1347-1:151a-16: ye shes kyi phung po drug ni phung po'i rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-17: 'chad par 'gyur bar rgya cher brjod par bya ste
T02D1347-1:151a-18: le'u dang po 'dir ni mdor bsdus pa tsam zhig
T02D1347-1:151a-20: 'dir stong pa chen po yi ge lnga ni dbyangs
T02D1347-1:151a-21: kyi tshogs te khu ba dang zla ba zhes brjod
T02D1347-1:151a-22: do // thig le stong pa yi ge drug ni
T02D1347-1:151a-23: gsal byed kyi tshogs te rdul dang nyi ma zhes
T02D1347-1:151a-24: do // brjod do // 'dir khu ba dang zla ba ni wam yig ste rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-25: rdul dang nyi ma ni ae yig ste padma 'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-26: rdo rje dang padma 'di gnyis gcig pa nyid ni
T02D1347-1:151a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' ste rdo rje ni mchog gi
T02D1347-1:151a-28: bde ba dang ye shes dang khu ba'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-29: sems dpa' ni rnam pa thams cad pa dang shes
T02D1347-1:151a-30: rab kyi gzugs dang shes bya dang nyi ma dang
T02D1347-1:151a-31: ye shes dang rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs
T02D1347-1:151a-32: pa dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa dang /
T02D1347-1:151a-33: de nyid dang 'gro ba'i don byed pa po yin no //
T02D1347-1:151a-34: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes gcig tu sbyor ba 'di nyid zhal bzhi'i rgyur 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:151a-35: ye shes ni nub kyi zhal ser po'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-36: rnam par shes pa ni shar gyi zhal nag po'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-37: zla ba dang sku ni byang gi zhal dkar po'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-38: nyi ma dang gsung ni lho'i zhal dmar po'o //
T02D1347-1:151a-39: zla ba dang nyi ma 'di dag ni gtso bo
T02D1347-1:151a-40: dang dpal pa'i dbye bas khams drug drug tu rtogs
T02D1347-1:151a-41: par bya ste / de dag kyang sa dang chu
T02D1347-1:151a-42: dang me dang rlung dang ro dang ro chen po'i
T02D1347-1:151b-0: par bya ste / cha shas so // 'di @151b rnams la khu ba las byung ba gsum dang /
T02D1347-1:151b-1: byung ba ma yin pa gsum ste /
T02D1347-1:151b-2: chu'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang ro'i khams te /
T02D1347-1:151b-3: khams 'di dag ni khu ba las byung ba'o //
T02D1347-1:151b-4: ro'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyi ming ngo //
T02D1347-1:151b-5: rdul las byung ba gsum dang byung ba ma yin par gsum ste /
T02D1347-1:151b-6: sa'i khams dang me'i khams dang ro chen po'i khams te /
T02D1347-1:151b-7: khams 'di dag ni rdul las byung ba'o //
T02D1347-1:151b-8: 'dir ro chen po ni ye shes kyi khams kyi ming ngo //
T02D1347-1:151b-9: khams lhag ma dag ni khu ba dang rdul las byung ba'o //
T02D1347-1:151b-10: de ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dag las byung
T02D1347-1:151b-11: ba'i khams gsum po rnams ni rim pa ji lta
T02D1347-1:151b-12: ba bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi lus
T02D1347-1:151b-13: dang ngag dang sems su 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:151b-14: zla ba'i khams rnams thabs kyi lus dang ngag dang sems dang /
T02D1347-1:151b-15: nyi ma'i khams rnams shes rab kyi lus dang ngag
T02D1347-1:151b-16: dang sems te khu ba dang rdul las byung ba'i
T02D1347-1:151b-17: rgyu'i phyir ro // khams 'di dag ni dbang po drug la sogs pa rnams kyi rigs drug go //
T02D1347-1:151b-18: de bzhin du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs
T02D1347-1:151b-19: ni ngo bo nyid kyi rigs dang lhan cig rigs
T02D1347-1:151b-20: bzhir 'gyur ro // sku gsum sku bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:151b-21: gnas skabs gsum gnas skabs bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:151b-22: de bzhin du khams lnga'i rigs ni ye shes kyi khams dang lhan cig rigs drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:151b-23: de bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi phung
T02D1347-1:151b-24: po lnga'i rigs ni ye shes kyi phung po dang
T02D1347-1:151b-25: lhan cig rigs drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:151b-26: bu mo la lo bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1347-1:151b-27: skyes pa la lo bcu drug gis te /
T02D1347-1:151b-28: bu mo la rdul gyi dus ji srid par rigs gsum dang rigs lngar rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:151b-29: skyes pa la khu ba 'pho pa'i dus ji srid par rigs gsum dang rigs lngar rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:151b-30: ye shes kyi khams byung ba'i dus nas 'chi ba'i
T02D1347-1:151b-31: bar du gnyis ka la rigs bzhi dang rigs drug
T02D1347-1:151b-32: go // de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:151b-33: rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid //
T02D1347-1:151b-34: rang bzhin gcig dang rigs brgya'o //
T02D1347-1:152a-0: da ni rigs kyi rigs can brjod pa sangs rgyas @152a * //
T02D1347-1:152a-2: 'dir sangs rgyas ni ye shes dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa phung po drug go //
T02D1347-1:152a-3: lha dang lha min yang zhes pa'i yang yig gis
T02D1347-1:152a-4: byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi dbang po la sogs
T02D1347-1:152a-5: pa drug dang de bzhin du khams drug dang yul
T02D1347-1:152a-6: drug dang / de bzhin du khro bo drug las kyi dbang po drug dang /
T02D1347-1:152a-7: khro bo'i lha mo drug las kyi dbang po'i bya ba drug go //
T02D1347-1:152a-8: lha ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs bcu gnyis la 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams te /
T02D1347-1:152a-9: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02D1347-1:152a-10: lha min ni klu'i rgyal po rnams dang lha mo khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:152a-11: da ni mu stegs pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir rang bzhin dang skyes bu brjod do //
T02D1347-1:152a-12: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:152a-13: sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo //
T02D1347-1:152a-14: 'byung dang sdud par byed pa mo //
T02D1347-1:152a-15: rang nyid byed po rang 'phrog po //
T02D1347-1:152a-16: rang nyid rgyal po rang gtso bo //
T02D1347-1:152a-18: don dam par byed pa po dang 'phrog pa po med do //
T02D1347-1:152a-19: mu stegs byed rnams kyis yongs su brtags pa'i chos
T02D1347-1:152a-20: rang bzhin dang skyes bu la sogs pa gzhan yang
T02D1347-1:152a-21: ngo // 'dir mu stegs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:152a-22: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid dang skyes bu nyi
T02D1347-1:152a-24: de la rtsa ba'i rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
T02D1347-1:152a-25: sems can rnams kyi bzhi pa'i gnas skabs skyed par byed pa nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1347-1:152a-26: chen po la sogs pa bdun ni rang bzhin dang
T02D1347-1:152a-27: rnam par 'gyur ba ste sa dang chu dang me
T02D1347-1:152a-28: dang rlung dang yid dang blo dang nga rgyal lo
T02D1347-1:152a-29: // rnam pa bcu drug ni rnam par 'gyur ba ste /
T02D1347-1:152a-30: dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang las kyi dbang po lnga dang mchog gi dbang po ste /
T02D1347-1:152a-31: rang bzhin dang rnam par 'gyur ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:152a-32: 'dir skyes bu ni khyab byed nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D1347-1:152a-33: rang bzhin yang ma yin rnam par 'gyur ba yang
T02D1347-1:152a-34: ma yin te ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:152a-35: phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid grub ste /
T02D1347-1:152a-36: phyi rol du khams lnga dang sgra gcan dang nyi
T02D1347-1:152a-37: ma dang zla ba zhes pa ni rang bzhin brgyad
T02D1347-1:152b-0: @152b do ; / bkra shis la sogs pa gza' lnga ni dbang po lnga dang yul lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:152b-1: sa la sogs pa rnams kyi ro drug ni rnam par 'gyur ba bcu drug ste /
T02D1347-1:152b-2: kha cig ni dbang po la sogs pa rnams dang 'tsho ba'i lus drug ces so //
T02D1347-1:152b-3: de bzhin du lus la sna tshogs tshad ni nang gi le'ur brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:152b-4: srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa zhes pa la /
T02D1347-1:152b-5: 'dir phyi rol du srid pa gsum ni 'jig rten
T02D1347-1:152b-6: gyi khams yin la nang du ni mi'i lus kyi
T02D1347-1:152b-7: khams so // de'i bkod pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1347-1:152b-8: rim pas bshad du gsol zhes pa bya ba'i nges
T02D1347-1:152b-9: khams so // pa'o // lha dang lha min rnams
T02D1347-1:152b-10: kyi longs spyod dang zhes pa ni 'dir lha rnams
T02D1347-1:152b-11: nyin mo longs spyod cing lha ma yin rnams mtshan
T02D1347-1:152b-12: mo longs spyod de de bzhin du byang du bgrod
T02D1347-1:152b-14: dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang
T02D1347-1:152b-15: mi'i bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol
T02D1347-1:152b-16: zhes pa la / 'dir 'jig rten gyi bden pas
T02D1347-1:152b-17: tshon dang thig gdab pas rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:152b-18: zhes pa la / dang / don dam pa'i dben
T02D1347-1:152b-19: pas nam mkha'i khams la thig gdab pa dang bral
T02D1347-1:152b-20: zhes pa la / dang / zhing / tshon dgye
T02D1347-1:152b-21: ba dang bral ba kha dog dang phyag dang dbyibs
T02D1347-1:152b-22: kyi gzugs kyi lha rnam par rtog pas bsgoms pa'i
T02D1347-1:152b-24: rnam pa thams cad pa me long gi pra phab pa lta bu bshad du gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-1:152b-25: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dbang ni chu dang
T02D1347-1:152b-26: cod pan dang dar dpyangs dang rdo rje dril bu
T02D1347-1:152b-27: dang brtul zhugs chen po dang ming dang rjes su
T02D1347-1:152b-29: de bzhin du gong ma ni bum pa dang gsang pa dang ye shes rab ye shes so //
T02D1347-1:152b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bcu gcig pa ni
T02D1347-1:152b-31: bzhi pa ste thams cad yang dag par bshad du
T02D1347-1:152b-32: gsol lo // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1347-1:152b-33: 'phags pa'i yul 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rdo
T02D1347-1:152b-34: rje slob dpon rdzas la brkam pa dag 'byung bar
T02D1347-1:152b-35: 'gyur te / phyug po rdzas kyis mngon par khengs
T02D1347-1:152b-36: pa rnams kyi khyim du song nas rdzas kyi don
T02D1347-1:152b-37: du chos 'tshang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1347-1:152b-38: rdzas la chags pas skal pa dang mi ldan pa
T02D1347-1:152b-39: rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ster bar
T02D1347-1:153a-1: dang po rgyal po la sogs pa'i mngag gzhug pa phyi nas bla mar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-2: rdzas kyis dman pa mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi
T02D1347-1:153a-3: lam yongs su btang zhing sems can skal pa dang
T02D1347-1:153a-4: ldan par gyur pa gzhan rnams la yang 'jig rten
T02D1347-1:153a-5: las 'das pa'i dbang mi ster bar 'gyur ba dang
T02D1347-1:153a-6: / de dag rnams la nyon mongs pa skyed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-7: rdzas kyi dbang gis gdug pa'i sems can rnams la
T02D1347-1:153a-8: rdo rje'i tshig rab tu gsal bar byed par 'gyur
T02D1347-1:153a-9: ba dang / gzhan yang rdo rje'i tshig mi shes
T02D1347-1:153a-10: pa phan tshun rtsod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang
T02D1347-1:153a-11: ba dang / / mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal
T02D1347-1:153a-12: gyis rgyud kyi don mi shes pa rnams kyang rgyud
T02D1347-1:153a-13: kyi 'grel bshad byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-14: bdud kyi ris rnams sems can rnams kyi bla mar
T02D1347-1:153a-15: gyur nas rdo rje'i tshig phyin ci log tu ston
T02D1347-1:153a-17: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dbang po gnyis las skyes
T02D1347-1:153a-18: pa'i bde bar byis pa'i blo can rnams la ston
T02D1347-1:153a-20: gsum pa shes rab ye shes de nyid bzhi pa ste /
T02D1347-1:153a-21: de yang de bzhin no zhes pa'i sgra rgyu dang
T02D1347-1:153a-22: 'bras bu dbye ba med pas bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1347-1:153a-23: gsungs so zhes gsum pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1347-1:153a-24: ye shes su smra bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-25: 'phags pa'i yul gang du mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis /
T02D1347-1:153a-26: glegs bam mthong nas dbang bskur med par rdo rje
T02D1347-1:153a-27: theg pa ston pa po byed par 'gyur ba de'i
T02D1347-1:153a-28: phyir / de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi gdug pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi 'jug pa gzigs nas /
T02D1347-1:153a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-30: rgyud gzhan thams cad du bzhi pa shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gsal por ma mdzad de /
T02D1347-1:153a-32: bsdus pa'i rgyud rnams su bzhi pa shes rab ye shes dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-33: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa du ba la sogs pa'i lam shin tu sbas shing /
T02D1347-1:153a-34: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'ga' zhig la rab tu gsal lo //
T02D1347-1:153a-35: rtsa ba'i rgyud mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di dang /
T02D1347-1:153a-36: bsdus pa'i rgyud la yang bzhi pa shes rab ye
T02D1347-1:153b-0: shes rab tu gsal zhing phyag @153b rgya chen po
T02D1347-1:153b-1: bsgom pa du ba la sogs pa'i lam yang rab
T02D1347-1:153b-2: tu gsal ba / rdo rje slob dpon brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1347-1:153b-3: dper na sngags kyi lha dang /
T02D1347-1:153b-4: phyi rol gyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
T02D1347-1:153b-6: rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa yang /
T02D1347-1:153b-7: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:153b-8: rnam par dag pa'i rim pa phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ster bar byed pa po 'di /
T02D1347-1:153b-9: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la rab tu gsal bar glegs bam du bris te ;
T02D1347-1:153b-10: chu bo sh'i ta'i byang du sems can skal ba
T02D1347-1:153b-11: dang ldan pa rnams kyi sems kyi lhag par mos
T02D1347-1:153b-12: pa mkhyen nas / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing /
T02D1347-1:153b-13: phyag na rdo rjes glegs bam la bris pa'o //
T02D1347-1:153b-14: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa tshad [?] mar byas nas /
T02D1347-1:153b-15: sems can rnams the tshom med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa des na /
T02D1347-1:153b-16: sngags kyi theg pa'i tshul thams cad kyi nges pa'i don /
T02D1347-1:153b-17: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D1347-1:153b-18: kyis phyag na rdo rje la yang dag par bstan
T02D1347-1:153b-19: to // de'i phyir gang gis mchog gi dang po'i
T02D1347-1:153b-20: sangs rgyas mi shes pa des mtshan yang dag par
T02D1347-1:153b-22: gang gis mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mi shes
T02D1347-1:153b-23: pa des rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes kyi sku
T02D1347-1:153b-24: mi shes so // gang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D1347-1:153b-25: ye shes kyi sku mi shes pa des sngags kyi
T02D1347-1:153b-27: gang gis sngags kyi theg pa mi shes pa de
T02D1347-1:153b-28: dag thams cad ni 'khor ba pa ste bcom ldan
T02D1347-1:153b-29: 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lam dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:153b-30: de lta bas na mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas
T02D1347-1:153b-31: ni bla ma dam pa rnams kyis bstan par bya
T02D1347-1:153b-32: zhing / thar pa don du gnyer pa'i slob ma dam pa rnams kyis mnyan par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:153b-33: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-1:153b-34: 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-1:153b-35: ston phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-1:153b-36: las / dkyil 'khor dang dbang la sogs pa bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus te drug pa'o /
T02D1347-1:154a-0: // / @154a * // da ni sdud par byed pa po 'jam dpal gyis
T02D1347-1:154a-1: zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu zhes pa
T02D1347-1:154a-2: la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas mchog
T02D1347-1:154a-3: gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1347-1:154a-4: lan gyi tshig yang dag par bsdus pa de nyid
T02D1347-1:154a-6: zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu zhes pa
T02D1347-1:154a-7: la zla ba bzang po ni bod pa ste kye
T02D1347-1:154a-8: zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu'o //
T02D1347-1:154a-9: gang las ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1347-1:154a-10: gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-1:154a-11: rnal 'byor 'di ni rab mchog lha dang mi la
T02D1347-1:154a-12: sogs pa rnams kyis shes pa ma yin pas de'i
T02D1347-1:154a-13: phyir bdag mgu'o // 'dir rab mchog lha rnams ni
T02D1347-1:154a-14: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris la sogs pa nas 'du shes
T02D1347-1:154a-15: med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi mthar nye
T02D1347-1:154a-17: mi ni 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154a-18: srin po ni bden bral la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154a-19: lha min ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1347-1:154a-20: / klu ni mtha' yas la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154a-21: chags bral ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154a-22: thub mchog ni drang srong mi sbyin la sogs pa ste 'di dag gi rigs rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-1:154a-23: rab mchog lha dang mi la sogs pa 'di rnams
T02D1347-1:154a-24: kyis shes pa ma yin pa dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-1:154a-25: rnal 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs 'dzin
T02D1347-1:154a-26: ma'i mthar thug ces pa gang gi dang po mya
T02D1347-1:154a-27: ngan las 'das pa ye shes kyi khams dang mtha'
T02D1347-1:154a-28: 'dzin mas ste dbus su ma brjod pa nyid las
T02D1347-1:154a-29: nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu'i khams so
T02D1347-1:154a-30: // nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams 'di dag ni khyab par bya ba ste /
T02D1347-1:154a-31: khyab par byed pa ni ye shes kyi khams so //
T02D1347-1:154a-32: de ltar khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i 'brel pas rnal 'byor te /
T02D1347-1:154a-33: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa //
T02D1347-1:154a-34: sa dang chu dang de bzhin me //
T02D1347-1:154a-35: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang ni //
T02D1347-1:154a-36: rnam shes khams drug par brjod pa //
T02D1347-1:154a-37: skyes bu chen po'i gang zag go //
T02D1347-1:154a-39: tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas zhes pa la tshig
T02D1347-1:154a-40: ni rnam pa gnyis te a'a li k'a li'i bdag
T02D1347-1:154a-41: nyid can no // de dag gi bgrod pa ni
T02D1347-1:154a-42: tshig gi bgrod pa ste mgrin pa dang rkan dang
T02D1347-1:154a-43: spyi bo dang mchu dang so'i gnas rnams las dbyangs
T02D1347-1:154b-0: @154b dang gsal byed rnams brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154b-1: bgrod pa de dang bcas pa ni sngags kyi brdas rab tu brdzod [*brjod?] pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154b-2: 'dir sngags kyi brda ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig
T02D1347-1:154b-3: ni sngags kyi brda yin la gnyis pa ni de
T02D1347-1:154b-5: de la sngags kyi brda ni rab tu brjod pa ste 'jig rten pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154b-6: de kho na nyid ni dam pa'i don can tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:154b-7: gang du rab tu brjod pa'i brda yin pa der
T02D1347-1:154b-8: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa la sogs pa sngags kyi
T02D1347-1:154b-9: ming ngo // gang du de kho na nyid kyi
T02D1347-1:154b-10: brda yin pa der aa yig ni chos thams cad
T02D1347-1:154b-11: kyi sgo ste gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid
T02D1347-1:154b-13: de bzhin du sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:154b-15: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas aa las byung //
T02D1347-1:154b-16: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / don chen yi ge dam pa yin //
T02D1347-1:154b-17: srog chen po ste skye ba med //
T02D1347-1:154b-18: tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste //
T02D1347-1:154b-19: brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog / tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed //
T02D1347-1:154b-21: yang de nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las /
T02D1347-1:154b-22: gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge med //
T02D1347-1:154b-23: gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa //
T02D1347-1:154b-24: stong pa chen po yi ge lnga //
T02D1347-1:154b-25: thig le stong pa yi ge drug / ces so //
T02D1347-1:154b-26: de kho na nyid dam pa'i don can gyi brda
T02D1347-1:154b-27: sngags kyi theg pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D1347-1:154b-28: pa / 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa ye
T02D1347-1:154b-29: shes kyi khams gzhom du med cing brjod du med
T02D1347-1:154b-30: pa / pa ste / brjod du med pa'i dbyangs
T02D1347-1:154b-31: dang gsal byed kyi mtshan nyid can no zhes so
T02D1347-1:154b-32: pa / pa ste / // nam mkha'i khams la
T02D1347-1:154b-33: sogs pa'i sngags kyi brda rab tu brjod pa'i mtshan
T02D1347-1:154b-34: nyid can mgrin pa la sogs pa nas brjod pa'i
T02D1347-1:154b-35: chos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:154b-36: 'dir aa ku ha rnam par bcad pa ni mgrin pa las so //
T02D1347-1:154b-37: ai tsu ya sha ni rkan las so //
T02D1347-1:154b-38: ri tu ra sha ni spyi bo las so //
T02D1347-1:154b-39: au pu wa [?] thpa ni mchu las so //
T02D1347-1:154b-40: li tu las ni [?] so las so //
T02D1347-1:154b-41: de bzhin du gnas gnyis pa dang gnas gsum pa dang /
T02D1347-1:154b-42: gnas bzhi pa dang gnas lnga pa'i sngags te brtsegs
T02D1347-1:154b-43: pa'i sngags rnams kyang rab tu brjod pa'i brdas rig
T02D1347-1:155a-0: par bya'o // ming gi rang bzhin can de dag thams cad kyang @155a * //
T02D1347-1:155a-1: 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i slad du ming can gyi dngos po rnams go bar byed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:155a-2: de kho na nyid kyi brda tshig tu brjod pa
T02D1347-1:155a-3: spangs pa dam pa'i don can las kyi phyag rgya
T02D1347-1:155a-4: dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub spangs
T02D1347-1:155a-5: pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
T02D1347-1:155a-6: slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po
T02D1347-1:155a-7: thams cad las nges par bstan to //
T02D1347-1:155a-8: sbyor ba 'di mtha' dag ni lus dbus su ste /
T02D1347-1:155a-9: dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1347-1:155a-10: rim pas sems can thams cad kyis sgrib pa med
T02D1347-1:155a-11: pa'i gnas thob par bya ba'i slad du bdag gis
T02D1347-1:155a-12: bshad par bya yis mi'i bdag po bzang po khyod
T02D1347-1:155a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi tshig bsdus pa'i mdor bstan pa'o //
T02D1347-1:155a-15: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1347-1:155a-16: bsdus pa sdud par byed pa po 'jam dpal gyis
T02D1347-1:155a-17: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las dus kyi stong
T02D1347-1:155a-18: pa rnams las zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su
T02D1347-1:155a-19: bcad pa bzhi pas bstan pa bdag gis dgrol bar
T02D1347-1:155a-20: bya'o // sngags kyi tshul 'di la bsngags pa ni /
T02D1347-1:155a-21: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
T02D1347-1:155a-22: theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:155a-23: gang theg pa gsum gyi dgongs pa mi shes pa
T02D1347-1:155a-24: de ni dus las thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam las
T02D1347-1:155a-26: sngags kyi theg pa la ldem por dgongs pa'i skad
T02D1347-1:155a-27: gzhan mi shes pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-1:155a-28: dang / tshogs khang dang gtsug lag khang gi rdzas la nye par longs spyod pa byas pa dang /
T02D1347-1:155a-29: rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyogs gzung bas phyi rol
T02D1347-1:155a-30: gyi yul nye bar longs spyod pa la chags par
T02D1347-1:155a-31: gyur na / slob dpon gyi chas kyis dkon mchog
T02D1347-1:155a-32: gsum la co dris nas dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
T02D1347-1:155a-33: gyur na / ro // 'dir 'jig rten pha rol
T02D1347-1:155a-34: dang 'jig rten 'di'i don du sems can rnams kyis
T02D1347-1:155a-35: mnyes par bya ba'i rgan pa bzhi ste /
T02D1347-1:155a-36: de dag las ye shes kyi rgan pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /
T02D1347-1:155a-37: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa thob pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dge slong ngam /
T02D1347-1:155a-38: khyim pa mchod par 'os pa dge slong bcu dang mnyam par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:155b-0: de @155b ming [?] na dka' thub kyis rgan pa ni ngur smrig 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1347-1:155b-1: ngur smrig 'dzin pa rnams las lo dang /
T02D1347-1:155b-2: sngags pa rnams dbang gis rgan pa khyim pa'i slob dpon rnams kyis thams cad du phyag bya ste /
T02D1347-1:155b-3: dka' thub kyis rgan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1347-1:155b-4: khyim pa rnams la mngon par shes pa med pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1347-1:155b-5: / thos pas rgan pa ni mkhas pa mchod par 'os pa /
T02D1347-1:155b-6: bstan pa gsal bar byed pa phas kyi rgol ba bdud kyi rigs rnams 'dul bar byed pa ste /
T02D1347-1:155b-7: 'di dag ni 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du sems can rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o //
T02D1347-1:155b-8: nor gyis rgan pa ni rgyal po ste 'jig rten
T02D1347-1:155b-9: 'de'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba rnams kyis mnyes
T02D1347-1:155b-10: par bya ba'o // de ltar rgan po bzhi ni sems can rnams kyis mnyes par bya ba'o //
T02D1347-1:155b-11: de'i phyir theg pa gsum shes pa po ni dka' thub kyis rgan pa ste /
T02D1347-1:155b-12: khyim pa la ni ji srid dka' thub par ma
T02D1347-1:155b-13: gyur par nyan thos kyi theg pa las so sor
T02D1347-1:155b-14: thar pa mnyan pa'i skabs med do /
T02D1347-1:155b-16: // / de'i phyir khyim pa ni mngon shes dang ldan
T02D1347-1:155b-17: pa ma gtogs par rgan por mi 'gyur zhing khyim
T02D1347-1:155b-18: pa rab tu byung ba dang bral ba rnams tshogs
T02D1347-1:155b-19: khang dang gtsug lag khang la nye bar longs spyod
T02D1347-1:155b-20: pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa gang du
T02D1347-1:155b-22: de bas na theg pa gsum yongs su shes par
T02D1347-1:155b-23: bya ba'i slad du dang por bye brag tu smra
T02D1347-1:155b-24: ba'i gzhung la brten nas rdul phra rab 'dus pa'i
T02D1347-1:155b-25: bdag nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yod cing de
T02D1347-1:155b-26: bzhin du khur ba'i gang zag yod de rtag pa'am
T02D1347-1:155b-27: mi rtag par bdag mi smra'o zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D1347-1:155b-31: chags pa dang 'jig pa'i dus kyang rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:155b-32: des na chags pa ni 'byung ba'i dus kyi dbang
T02D1347-1:155b-33: gi stong pa rnams las zhes pa la stong pa
T02D1347-1:155b-34: rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis mig la
T02D1347-1:155b-35: sogs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin
T02D1347-1:155b-36: pa rdul phra rab kyi ngo bos rnam par gnas
T02D1347-1:155b-37: pa sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro'i
T02D1347-1:155b-38: rdzas yon tan lnga dang bzhi dang gsum dang gnyis
T02D1347-1:155b-39: dang gcig gi rang bzhin rnams dang /
T02D1347-1:155b-40: yon tan drug pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par byed pa ni stong pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:156a-0: @156a * // stong pa rdul phra rab de rnams las 'byung ba'i
T02D1347-1:156a-1: dus kyi dbang gis rlung zhes bya ba ni rdul
T02D1347-1:156a-2: phra rab de rnams kyi nang nas dang por re
T02D1347-1:156a-3: zhig rlung gi rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun 'byar
T02D1347-1:156a-4: bar 'gyur ro // 'byar ba de las yang zhing
T02D1347-1:156a-5: g-yo ba nyid du bgrod pa ni rlung zhes brjod
T02D1347-1:156a-6: bar 'gyur ro // do // de bzhin du me'i
T02D1347-1:156a-7: rdul pra rab rnams kun du 'byar bar gyur pa
T02D1347-1:156a-8: rlung dang ldan pa'i glog ni me zhes brjod do
T02D1347-1:156a-9: bar 'gyur ro // do // // de bzhin du
T02D1347-1:156a-10: chu'i rdul phra rab rnams 'dus pa kun du 'byar
T02D1347-1:156a-11: bar gyur pa rlung dang me dang ldan pa'i char
T02D1347-1:156a-13: de bzhin du sa'i rdul phra rab kun du 'byar
T02D1347-1:156a-14: ba nam mkha' la dbang po'i gzhung snang ba ni
T02D1347-1:156a-16: ro'i rdul phra rab rnams ni thams cad du khyab par byed pa ste /
T02D1347-1:156a-17: de ltar stong pa lnga rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma rnams su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:156a-18: yang dag par 'dzin pa dang srub pa dang dbyibs
T02D1347-1:156a-19: kyi rlung gi mthu las gling dang ri bo rgya
T02D1347-1:156a-20: mtsho dang zhes pa la gling ni bdun no ;
T02D1347-1:156a-23: rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi
T02D1347-1:156a-24: tshogs dang drang srong zhes pa la rgyu skar ni
T02D1347-1:156a-25: nyi shu rtsa bdun dang de'i 'brel pa mtha' yas
T02D1347-1:156a-26: pa'o // nyi zla ni zlum po'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1347-1:156a-27: skar ma gza' yi tshogs zhes pa ni de bzhin
T02D1347-1:156a-28: nyid du skar ma'i rnam pa can bkra shis la
T02D1347-1:156a-30: drang srong ni skar ma bdun no //
T02D1347-1:156a-31: lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang //
T02D1347-1:156a-32: zhes pa la lha ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:156a-33: 'byung po ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang yi dags la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:156a-34: klu ni mtha' yas la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-1:156a-35: dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang zhes pa
T02D1347-1:156a-36: la sgo nga las skyes pa ni nam mkha' lding
T02D1347-1:156a-37: la sogs pa ste rlung gi skye gnas so //
T02D1347-1:156a-38: mngal nas skyes pa ni glang po'i dbang po la sogs pa ste me'i skye gnas so //
T02D1347-1:156a-39: drod gsher las skyes pa ni srin bu dang phye
T02D1347-1:156a-40: ma leb dang grog spur la sogs pa ste chu'i
T02D1347-1:156a-41: skye gnas so // rdzus te skyes pa ni ljon pa la sogs pa ste sa'i skye gnas so //
T02D1347-1:156a-42: de bzhin du rdzus te skyes pa chen po ni ro'i skye gnas so //
T02D1347-1:156a-43: sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu zhes pa las zhes pa ni lung gi tshig go //
T02D1347-1:156a-44: sna tshogs kyang de yin las yang yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs sa ste /
T02D1347-1:156b-0: gling bdun gyi rang bzhin dang dum bu @156b bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:156b-1: de'i 'og ni sna tshogs sa'i 'og ste klu'i srid pa dang dmyal ba'i srid pa bdun no //
T02D1347-1:156b-2: sna tshogs sa de la mi rnams dang 'og dmyal
T02D1347-1:156b-3: ba'i srid par dmyal ba rnams te yang yig ni
T02D1347-1:156b-5: stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste /
T02D1347-1:156b-6: chu la lan tshva dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su
T02D1347-1:156b-7: sgong skyes bzhin zhes pa ni 'dir brtan pa rnams
T02D1347-1:156b-8: skyed pa la lan tshva dang g-yo ba rnams skyed
T02D1347-1:156b-9: pa la sgo nga dper 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:156b-10: dang zhes pa ni sdud pa'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-11: dper na nyi ma'i 'od kyi sbyor ba las lan
T02D1347-1:156b-12: tshva chu'i rdul phra rab rnams lan tshva sra ba
T02D1347-1:156b-13: nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du lhun po la
T02D1347-1:156b-14: sogs pa brtan pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:156b-15: dper na khu bzhu ba'i rdul phra rab rnams sgo
T02D1347-1:156b-16: nga'i dbus su gdong ba'i lus la sogs pa'i cha
T02D1347-1:156b-17: shas nyid du 'gyur ba de bzhin du g-yo ba
T02D1347-1:156b-18: sems can rnams rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-19: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'byung ba ni le'u lnga par rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams bsdus pa'i mdor bsdus chen po'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-21: da ni 'jam dpal gyis lus dang zhes pa la
T02D1347-1:156b-22: sogs pa snga ma'i rim pas bstan pa rdo rje'i
T02D1347-1:156b-23: lus bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa bdag
T02D1347-1:156b-25: lus zhes pa ni zla ba sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-26: ye shes zhes pa ni nyi ma sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-27: nam mkha' zhes pa ni nam mkha'i khams sgrib pa
T02D1347-1:156b-28: dang bral ba ste de bzhin du rlung gi khams
T02D1347-1:156b-29: dang me'i khams dang chu'i khams dang sa'i khams so
T02D1347-1:156b-30: // brtan pa zhes pa ni khams lnga'i bdag nyid brtan pa'i khams sgrib pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-31: g-yo ba zhes pa ni khams drug gi bdag nyid
T02D1347-1:156b-32: kyi gang zag gi khams sgrib pa dang bral ba'o
T02D1347-1:156b-33: // lha ni mthong [?] ba skyed min dag dang
T02D1347-1:156b-34: zhes pa ni lha yang de yin la mthong [?]
T02D1347-1:156b-35: bskyed min yang yin pa de ni lha ni mthong
T02D1347-1:156b-37: gzugs med pa'i srid pa rnam par shes pa'i nga
T02D1347-1:156b-38: rgyal tsam dang ldan pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
T02D1347-1:156b-39: mched la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:156b-40: de ltar lus la sogs pa rdo rje ye shes
T02D1347-1:156b-41: kyi rten srid pa rnam pa bcur de bzhin gshegs
T02D1347-1:156b-42: pas gsungs pa rdo rje'i lus las sngags kyi skye
T02D1347-1:156b-43: gnas thig le la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:156b-44: // mi'i bdag po ni bod pa'o //
T02D1347-1:157a-1: kyi skye gnas ni zla ba las thig le dang /
T02D1347-1:157a-2: nyi ma las rnam par bcad pa dang /
T02D1347-1:157a-3: nam mkha'i khams las aa dang rlung gi khams las
T02D1347-1:157a-4: ai dang me'i khams las ri dang chu'i khams las
T02D1347-1:157a-5: au dang sa'i khams las li dang brtan pa'i khams
T02D1347-1:157a-6: las gsal byed ma dang g-yo ba'i khams las gsal
T02D1347-1:157a-7: byed ksha dang gzugs med pa'i khams las gsal byed
T02D1347-1:157a-8: ha yig ste / sngags kyi tshig 'di dag g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya'o //

T02D1347-1:165a-30: kyi tshad rab tu bkod do //
T02D1347-1:165a-31: de'i phyir tshad 'di la sangs rgyas pa'i mdzod mthong nas 'khrul pa 'di mi bya ste /
T02D1347-1:165a-32: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D1347-1:165a-33: kyi tshad 'bum phrag sum cu so drug lhag pa
T02D1347-1:165a-34: dang / ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi'i tshad du gsungs /
T02D1347-1:165a-35: 'dir bcom ldan 'das brdzun gsung ba po yin nam
T02D1347-1:165a-36: ci zhes pa 'ga' zhig 'dod par gyur na de'i
T02D1347-1:165a-37: tshig mkhas pa rnams kyis khas blang bar mi bya
T02D1347-1:165a-38: ste sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis so //
T02D1347-1:165b-0: sems can @165b mos pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D1347-1:165b-1: grub mtha' sna tshogs rig pa po //
T02D1347-1:165b-2: sna tshogs lam la rab gnas pa //
T02D1347-1:165b-3: shes pa'i nga rgyal khengs pa can //
T02D1347-1:165b-4: de dag rang bzhin grub mtha' la //
T02D1347-1:165b-5: ji srid rigs pa ma bstan pa //
T02D1347-1:165b-6: de srid khengs pa can de dag / kun mkhyen gyi yang dbang mi 'gyur //
T02D1347-1:165b-7: sems can phan las mi bden pa //
T02D1347-1:165b-8: bsod nams tshogs kyi rgyu yin te //
T02D1347-1:165b-9: gzhan la gnod las bden pa ni //
T02D1347-1:165b-10: mnar mad la sogs rab tu ster //
T02D1347-1:165b-11: gtong ba po min yi dags kyis //
T02D1347-1:165b-12: khyim gyi gnas ni rir mthong ste //
T02D1347-1:165b-13: sdig pa byed pa dag gis khyim //
T02D1347-1:165b-14: khab rtse ri yi rnam par ro ;
T02D1347-1:165b-15: / sa 'og dngos grub thob gyur cing //
T02D1347-1:165b-16: lha mo rnams kyi grong 'gro ba //
T02D1347-1:165b-17: grub pa rnams kyis rab brtan sa //
T02D1347-1:165b-18: kun nas bug pa bcas par mthong //
T02D1347-1:165b-20: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad bcom ldan
T02D1347-1:165b-21: 'das kyis gsungs pa ni sems can rnams kyi rang
T02D1347-1:165b-22: gi sems kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis rab tu
T02D1347-1:165b-23: snang ba ste / de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par
T02D1347-1:165b-24: zhen pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzigs nas gzung ba
T02D1347-1:165b-25: dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bos dngos po'i tshad gsungs pa
T02D1347-1:165b-27: de ltar thams cad yongs su mkhyen nas drang srong
T02D1347-1:165b-28: rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'jig
T02D1347-1:165b-29: rten gyi khams kyi tshad dang lus kyi tshad dkyil
T02D1347-1:165b-30: 'khor gyi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so
T02D1347-1:165b-31: // 'dir rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su
T02D1347-1:165b-32: zhes pa ni sa dang chu dang me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:165b-33: rnams kyi 'og na rlung gi dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i
T02D1347-1:165b-34: khams la rnam par gnas te /
T02D1347-1:165b-35: rlung gi mtha' de nas lhun po'i bar du dmyal
T02D1347-1:165b-36: ba'i gnas bdun dang brgyad pa ni gdengs can gyi
T02D1347-1:165b-37: grong khyer te / dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis yin no //
T02D1347-1:165b-38: 'dir rlung gi dkyil 'khor stong phrag lnga bcur 'gyur
T02D1347-1:165b-39: te drag po'i rlung chen po dang mun pa chen
T02D1347-1:165b-40: po de la dmyal ba'i gnas gnyis steng 'og tu
T02D1347-1:165b-41: dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha ste
T02D1347-1:165b-42: rgya'i tshad ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad do //
T02D1347-1:165b-43: de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor la dmyal ba'i gnas gnyis te /
T02D1347-1:166a-1: dang de'i steng du du ba mi bzad pa'i dmyal ba'o //
T02D1347-1:166a-2: de bzhin du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dmyal ba gnyis
T02D1347-1:166a-3: te 'dam gyi chu 'dam dang chu yang dag par
T02D1347-1:166a-4: ldan pa dang bye ma'i chu bye ma dang chu
T02D1347-1:166a-5: yang dag par ldan pa ste grang ba chen po'o
T02D1347-1:166a-6: // sa'i dkyil 'khor la gseg ma chu'i dmyal ba dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1347-1:166a-7: de'i steng du gdengs can gyi grong khyer steng 'og tu dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1347-1:166a-8: de nyid la tshad rnam pa gnyis te phyed ni
T02D1347-1:166a-9: lha ma yin gyi gnas yin la phyed ni klu'i
T02D1347-1:166a-11: de bzhin du lus la rkang pa'i mthil nas rked
T02D1347-1:166a-12: pa'i bar du khru gnyis te khru gnyis po de
T02D1347-1:166a-13: nyid cha brgyad du byas nas cha re re la
T02D1347-1:166a-14: rim pa bzhin du dmyal ba dang gdengs can gyi
T02D1347-1:166a-15: grong khyer rnams rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:166a-16: lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste sa'i dkyil
T02D1347-1:166a-17: 'khor de nas lhun po'i tshad ni steng 'og tu
T02D1347-1:166a-18: dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig ste lus la rked pa
T02D1347-1:166a-19: nas mgrin pa'i 'og gi bar du khru gang ngo
T02D1347-1:166a-20: // de nyid du gza'i tshogs rnams 'khor te gza'i
T02D1347-1:166a-21: tshogs kyi gnas de nas stong phrag dag ni nyi
T02D1347-1:166a-22: shu lnga lhun po'i mgrin pa ste lus la sor
T02D1347-1:166a-23: // drug go // de nas gdong la lnga bcu
T02D1347-1:166a-24: lhun po'i gdong mgrin pa nas dpral ba'i mtha'i bar
T02D1347-1:166a-25: du ste lus la sor bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:166a-26: de nas brtan pa'i go 'phang g-yo med gtsug tor ni stong phrag nyi shu lnga ste /
T02D1347-1:166a-27: lus la dpral ba'i mtha' nas gtsug tor gyi gnas kyi bar du sor drug gi tshad do //
T02D1347-1:166a-28: de'i phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum
T02D1347-1:166a-29: bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyes [?] dman
T02D1347-1:166a-30: pa'o zhes pa ni 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1347-1:166a-31: steng gtsug tor de'i phyi rol stong pa gcig pu
T02D1347-1:166a-32: ste rdul phra rab so so'i ngo bo khams lnga
T02D1347-1:166a-34: nam mkha' ni ma yin te thams cad du khyab
T02D1347-1:166a-35: par byed pa'i phyir stong pa gcig pur rtogs par
T02D1347-1:166a-36: mi bya'o // de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad 'bum phrag bzhi ste lus la khru bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:166a-37: khru yang sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-1:166a-38: da ni 'dir zheng gi tshad gsungs pa rlung gi
T02D1347-1:166a-39: mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams la 'bum phrag bzhi ste
T02D1347-1:166a-40: rlung nas rlung gi mtha' shar nas nub kyi rlung
T02D1347-1:166b-0: gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar dang de @166b bzhin
T02D1347-1:166b-1: du lho nas byang gi mtha'i bar ro //
T02D1347-1:166b-2: brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang
T02D1347-1:166b-3: rgya mtsho rnams zhes pa ni de nas rlung gi
T02D1347-1:166b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me'i dkyil 'khor zlum po'i
T02D1347-1:166b-5: rnam pa dang / de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-1:166b-6: chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-1:166b-7: de nyid ni brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi ste de la gling drug dang ri drug dang /
T02D1347-1:166b-9: bdun pa chu'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pas rgya mtsho bdun dang /
T02D1347-1:166b-10: bdun pa 'dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pas gling bdun dang /
T02D1347-1:166b-11: rdo rje'i ri dang bcas pas ri bdun no //
T02D1347-1:166b-12: rdo rje'i ri ni rta gdong gi me ste lan
T02D1347-1:166b-13: tshva'i rgya mtsho chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar 'og dang
T02D1347-1:166b-14: thad ka'i cha la gnas so //
T02D1347-1:166b-15: sa 'dzam bu'i gling chen po'i mthar phyogs thams cad
T02D1347-1:166b-16: dang 'og tu lan tshva'i rgya mtsho rnam par gnas
T02D1347-1:166b-17: so // lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i mthar 'bum phrag bzhi'i phyed de /
T02D1347-1:166b-18: bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te zhes pa lhun po'i
T02D1347-1:166b-19: dbus nas g-yas g-yon du lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i dkyil
T02D1347-1:166b-20: 'khor gyi mthar 'bum phrag gnyis te g-yas su 'bum
T02D1347-1:166b-21: phrag gcig dang g-yon du 'bum phrag gcig ste /
T02D1347-1:166b-22: de bzhin du shar dang nub dang rlung dang me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan du'o //
T02D1347-1:166b-23: lan tshva'i chu'i dkyil 'khor de las g-yas dang g-yon
T02D1347-1:166b-24: du me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag gnyis
T02D1347-1:166b-25: su 'gyur ro // g-yas su 'bum phrag gcig dang
T02D1347-1:166b-26: g-yon du 'bum phrag gcig ste phyogs thams cad du
T02D1347-1:166b-27: su 'gyur ro // de bzhin no // dbus na
T02D1347-1:166b-28: lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:166b-29: skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste //
T02D1347-1:166b-30: zhes pa ni dbus na lhun po'o //
T02D1347-1:166b-31: de ci 'dra ba zhig ce na gang gi steng
T02D1347-1:166b-32: na khyim gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa skar
T02D1347-1:166b-33: ma'i phung po mtha' yas pa dang bcas pa'i skar
T02D1347-1:166b-34: bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba'o //
T02D1347-1:166b-35: 'dir tshig 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod /
T02D1347-1:166b-36: gang gis 'di brjod par bya ba lhun po gzhan yang yod dam ci zhe na /
T02D1347-1:166b-37: brjod pa 'dir manda ra yang lhun po'i ming gis
T02D1347-1:166b-38: smos pa des na manda ra las tha dad du
T02D1347-1:166b-39: bya ba'i slad du tshig 'di rigs so //
T02D1347-1:167a-0: cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis zhes pa ni @167a * //
T02D1347-1:167a-1: 'dir brjod pa'i rim pas 'og dang steng dang shar
T02D1347-1:167a-2: dang nub dang lho dang byang gi cha drug la
T02D1347-1:167a-3: sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis
T02D1347-1:167a-4: so // srid gsum mtha' dag ni mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og ste /
T02D1347-1:167a-5: srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes //
T02D1347-1:167a-6: zhes pa chags pa skye ba'i dus kyi dbang gis yang dag par 'dzin pa dang srung ba dang /
T02D1347-1:167a-7: dbyibs kyi rlung gi dus kyi sbyor ba dag las
T02D1347-1:167a-8: sems can rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
T02D1347-1:167a-9: las kyi 'bras bu la nye bar longs spyod pa'i
T02D1347-1:167a-11: da ni 'dir khor yug gi tshad brjod pa 'jig
T02D1347-1:167a-12: rten khams kyi kun nas khor yug tu ni thad
T02D1347-1:167a-13: ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste
T02D1347-1:167a-14: / zhes pa ni 'dir 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D1347-1:167a-15: cad la thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur khor yug
T02D1347-1:167a-17: lhun po la sogs pa nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:167a-18: gyi mthar thug pa gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho
T02D1347-1:167a-19: la sogs pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1347-1:167a-20: sa'i khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang zhes pa la
T02D1347-1:167a-21: sa yi ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar du
T02D1347-1:167a-22: thad ka'i tshad 'bum phrag gcig ste khor yug gi
T02D1347-1:167a-24: de bzhin du chu me rlung rnams kyi zhes pa
T02D1347-1:167a-25: ni chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1347-1:167a-26: kyi rang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' nas rang
T02D1347-1:167a-27: rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i bar du thad ka'i
T02D1347-1:167a-31: khor yug gi tshad ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:167a-32: chu'i dkyil 'khor la 'bum phrag drug dang /
T02D1347-1:167a-33: me'i dkyil 'khor la 'bum phrag dgu dang /
T02D1347-1:167a-34: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la nyi ma ste 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su rim pas rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:167a-35: mi'i dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas
T02D1347-1:167a-36: la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa
T02D1347-1:167a-37: // de ni sa'i steng gi gnas su lus la
T02D1347-1:167a-38: rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang
T02D1347-1:167a-39: // ngo // zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa'i rim
T02D1347-1:167a-40: pas phyi rol tu 'jig rten gyi khams la dpag
T02D1347-1:167a-41: tshad 'bum phrag gcig gang yin pa de nyid rang
T02D1347-1:167a-42: gi lus la rang gi khru yis khru gang gi
T02D1347-1:167b-0: da ni phra rab ces pa la @167b sogs pas
T02D1347-1:167b-1: rdul phra rab la sogs pa rnams kyi dpag tshad
T02D1347-1:167b-2: brjod de / phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra

T02D1347-1:167b-4: phra rab brgyad phreng bar gnas pa dag gis phra
T02D1347-1:167b-5: mo gcig ste phra mo gcig gi tshad du 'gyur

T02D1347-1:167b-7: kyis mi rnams kyi skra yi rtse mor 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:167b-8: brjod de / ro // // skra yi rtse mo

T02D1347-1:167b-10: brjod de / ro // // // de rnams kyis shig gi tshad do //
T02D1347-1:167b-11: de rnams kyis nas kyi tshad do //
T02D1347-1:167b-12: ltos 'gro nas zhes pa ni de brgyad kyis sor du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:167b-13: sor mo nyi ma ni zung gis zhes pa nyi

T02D1347-1:167b-15: kyis nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste sor mo nyi shu
T02D1347-1:167b-16: rtsa bzhi phreng bar gnas pas khru'i tshad du 'gyur
T02D1347-1:167b-17: ro // de bzhis gzhur 'gyur te 'dir ni stong
T02D1347-1:167b-18: phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grag dag tu 'gyur
T02D1347-1:167b-19: ro // ro // de bzhis dpag tshad du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:167b-20: dpag tshad de yis lha yul la lha rnams kyi tshad dang /
T02D1347-1:167b-21: [?] sa la mi rnams kyi tshad dang /
T02D1347-1:167b-22: nam mkha' la nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa 'khor ba'i don du tshad yin no //
T02D1347-1:167b-23: da ni gzugs med pa'i srid pa la sogs pa srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig gsungs pa //
T02D1347-1:167b-24: dang por chos bzang bskal ba zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:167b-25: dang por ni thog mar ro //
T02D1347-1:167b-26: chos bzang gi sgras ni gzugs med pa'i srid pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-1:167b-27: bskal pa zhes pa ni gang du /
T02D1347-1:167b-28: lha rnams tshe bskal par gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-1:167b-29: gnas de ni chos bzang bskal pa zhes pa ste mtho ris kyi sa'o //
T02D1347-1:167b-30: zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste zhes pa
T02D1347-1:167b-31: la zung ni gnyis yin la de dag zung dang
T02D1347-1:167b-33: zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste zhes pa
T02D1347-1:167b-34: gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i gnas rnam pa bzhi zhes
T02D1347-1:167b-35: pa'i don to // bskal pa chen po gcig dang /
T02D1347-1:167b-37: gsum dang bzhi'i tshe'o zhes dgongs so //
T02D1347-1:167b-38: ri rab kyi gtsug tor gyi 'og skra'i gnas te
T02D1347-1:167b-39: zad par stong pa rnam pa bzhi bsgoms pa rnams
T02D1347-1:167b-40: kyi'o // de bzhin du tshangs pa'i bskal pa zung

T02D1347-1:167b-42: kyi'o // te / zad par rlung rnam pa bzhi bsgoms pa rnams kyi'o //

T02D1347-1:167b-44: zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag sna'i gnas te
T02D1347-1:167b-45: / zad par me rnam pa bzhi bsgoms pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-1: gyi bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag sna'i 'og ko sko'i mthar te /
T02D1347-1:168a-2: zad par chu rnam pa bzhi bsgoms pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-3: de bzhin du dkar po'i bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag mgrin pa'i gnas te /
T02D1347-1:168a-4: zad par sa rnam pa bzhi bsgoms pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-5: de ltar na gzugs can rnams kyi bskal pa bcu drug ste /
T02D1347-1:168a-6: bskal pa bcu drug nas brtsams nas bskal pa re re'i bar gyi tshe'o //

T02D1347-1:168a-10: / zhes gsungs te 'dod pa bcu gcig gi dbye bas tha dad do zhes pa'i don to //

T02D1347-1:168a-13: kyi sa bon gyi yi ge ni aa yig la
T02D1347-1:168a-15: de dag kyang ha yig gnyis dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-16: 'di ni stong pa drug tu dogs pa med pa'i tshig go //
T02D1347-1:168a-17: ai la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-1:168a-18: 'dir dbyangs bcu drug po gang dag gi dang po
T02D1347-1:168a-19: ai yig yin pa de dag ni ai la sogs
T02D1347-1:168a-21: ai la sogs pa bcu drug ni gzugs rnams so //
T02D1347-1:168a-22: ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur
T02D1347-1:168a-23: rab tu gsal te zhes pa ni dbyangs bcu'i rnam
T02D1347-1:168a-24: par 'gyur ba gang dag gi dang po ha yig
T02D1347-1:168a-25: yin la mtha' la yig yin pa /
T02D1347-1:168a-26: de dag ni ha sogs la mtha' ste 'dod pa rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:168a-27: rab tu gsal te lus las gsungs pa yod pa'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-28: gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o zhes pa ni gsal
T02D1347-1:168a-29: byed ka yig la sogs pa mtha' dag so sor
T02D1347-1:168a-30: brjod pas yang dag par bsdus pa ni yi ge
T02D1347-1:168a-31: gcig pa ka sa [?] ra 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:168a-32: ka dang sa brtsegs pa ksha [?] yig go zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:168a-33: de yang 'dod pa'i srid pa bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D1347-1:168a-34: srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig dag gis 'dir ni
T02D1347-1:168a-35: srid gsum du 'gyur zhes pa ni aa yig la
T02D1347-1:168a-36: sogs pa srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig po 'di
T02D1347-1:168a-37: dag gis srid pa gsum ste /
T02D1347-1:168a-40: gzugs med pa'i srid par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:168b-0: 'dir @168b srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig ces pa ni gzugs med la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-1: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
T02D1347-1:168b-2: ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
T02D1347-1:168b-3: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
T02D1347-1:168b-4: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:168b-5: 'og min la sogs pa gzugs bcu drug ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-21: tshangs ris zhes bya ba ni gzugs bcu drug go //
T02D1347-1:168b-22: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa 'dod pa bcu gcig ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-28: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha [?] drug ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-29: bskal pa chung ngu drug dang lnga dang bzhi dang
T02D1347-1:168b-30: gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi bskal pa'i tshe dang
T02D1347-1:168b-31: ldan pa'o // 'dir de'i nang du 'dus pa'i lha ma yin dang mi dang /
T02D1347-1:168b-33: yi dags dang dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i srid pa lnga ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-34: de ltar na srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig go //
T02D1347-1:168b-35: gzugs med pa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyi ming
T02D1347-1:168b-36: gi sngags aa yig la sogs pa rnams brjod pa'i
T02D1347-1:168b-38: 'di lta ste aa a'a aam aa: zhes pa ni gzugs med pa ste zang par nam mkha'o //
T02D1347-1:168b-39: ai a'i ae aee zhes pa ni zad par rlung ngo //
T02D1347-1:168b-40: ri r'i aa ra a'a ra zhes pa ni zad par me'o //
T02D1347-1:168b-41: au a'u ao aoo zhes pa ni zad par chu'o //
T02D1347-1:168b-42: li l'i aa la a'a la zhes pa ni zad par sa ste /
T02D1347-1:168b-44: zad par rlung la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D1347-1:168b-45: stobs kyis 'og min la sogs pa gzugs bcu drug
T02D1347-1:168b-46: tu 'gyur ro // ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a
T02D1347-1:168b-47: zhes pa 'dod pa na spyod pa drug tu sbyin
T02D1347-1:168b-48: pa'i stobs dang sngags bzlas pa'i stobs kyis 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:168b-49: tu 'gyur ro // // wa w'a zhes pa ni lha ma yin dang /
T02D1347-1:169a-0: @169a * // mi ste sbyin pa'i stobs kyis lha ma yin dang /
T02D1347-1:169a-2: mi dge ba'i las kyi stobs kyis mir 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:169a-3: la l'a zhes pa ni dud 'gro dang yi dags
T02D1347-1:169a-4: te sdig pa chung [?] dus dud 'gro dang sdig
T02D1347-1:169a-6: ksha yig gis dmyal ba ste sdig pa chen pos 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:169a-7: klu'i 'jig rten dang por bsod nams kyi stobs dang /
T02D1347-1:169a-8: dmyal ba'i gnas dang por sdig pa'i stobs kyis bskal ba chung ngu'i tshe'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-9: dmyal ba'i gnas gnyis pa dang gsum par bskal pa bar ma'i tshe'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-10: dmyal ba'i gnas bzhi pa dang lnga par bskal pa mchog gi tshe'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-11: dmyal ba'i gnas drug pa dang bdun par bskal pa chen po'i tshe'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-12: brgyad par 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar sdud pa'i tshe ste /
T02D1347-1:169a-13: de ltar srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig gis srid pa gsum mo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:169a-14: khams kyi dbye bas ni khams gsum mo //
T02D1347-1:169a-15: srid gsum ma lus ni mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og go //
T02D1347-1:169a-16: 'di yang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:169a-17: aa sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye ba las zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-18: bskal pa chung ngu'i tshad ni chu dang zheng la
T02D1347-1:169a-19: dpag tshad gcig pa'i dong ste de yang skra'i rtse
T02D1347-1:169a-20: mo phra mo rnams kyis yongs su bkang ba las
T02D1347-1:169a-21: lo brgya na skra'i rtse mo re re phyung bas
T02D1347-1:169a-22: gang gi tshe stong par gyur pa de'i tshe bskal
T02D1347-1:169a-23: pa chung ngu'i nyin zhag gcig go //
T02D1347-1:169a-24: nyin zhag de sum cu'i tshad kyis zla ba'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-25: zla ba bcu gnyis kyis lo'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-26: lo brgya la bskal pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-1:169a-27: de bzhin du de'i sde ni bskal pa bar ma ste /
T02D1347-1:169a-28: bskal pa bar ma'i sdes mchog gi bskal pa'o //
T02D1347-1:169a-29: de ltar sems can rnams sdig pa'i dbang gis bskal
T02D1347-1:169a-30: pa'i grangs du mar dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug
T02D1347-1:169a-32: lnga rnams bsod nams kyi dbang gis bskal pa du
T02D1347-1:169a-33: mar mtho ris la sogs pa'i bde bar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:169a-34: // da ni klu'i gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-1:169a-35: ming gsungs te ming de la rtsod pa med do
T02D1347-1:169a-36: // // rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni
T02D1347-1:169a-37: dmyal bar nges par brjod de zhes pa ni 'dir
T02D1347-1:169a-38: gnas gang na rin po che rnams kyis snang ba'i
T02D1347-1:169a-39: gnas de ni rin chen snang ste lha ma yin
T02D1347-1:169a-40: dang klu'i 'jig rten de nas 'og tu dpag tshad
T02D1347-1:169b-0: stong phrag @169b nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshad de rin
T02D1347-1:169b-1: chen snang de nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar
T02D1347-1:169b-2: nges par brjod de bshad ces pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:169b-3: bye ma'i chu zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-4: 'dam gyi chu ni gsum pa ste grang ba'i dmyal ba gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:169b-5: de'i 'og tu mi bzad pa'i du ba ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-6: me ni lnga pa ste tsha ba'i dmyal ba gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:169b-7: de nas 'og tu mun pa ni drug pa'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-8: du 'bod mun pa chen po ni bdun pa ste /
T02D1347-1:169b-9: drag po'i rlung gi dmyal ba gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:169b-10: rdo rje me lce dang bcas pa brgyad pa ni
T02D1347-1:169b-11: dang yig gis te rdo rje khab rtse'i sa'i cha
T02D1347-1:169b-13: dmyal ba chen po brgyad po rnams ni sa 'og na'o ;
T02D1347-1:169b-14: / lan tshva chang dang chu dang 'o ma dang
T02D1347-1:169b-15: zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te
T02D1347-1:169b-16: zhes pa'i lan tshva ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi
T02D1347-1:169b-17: rol na'o // chang la sogs pa ni sa'i steng na'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-18: ri bo ni bdun te 'od sngon manda ra ri ni sha ta dang /
T02D1347-1:169b-19: nor bu'i 'od zer tro na bsil ri rdo rje'o
T02D1347-1:169b-20: zhes pa'i rdo rje ni lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i phyi
T02D1347-1:169b-21: rol na'o // kha ba can la sogs pa'i ri
T02D1347-1:169b-22: rgyud so so ni chang la sogs pa'i rgya mtsho
T02D1347-1:169b-23: so so'i phyi rol na chu'i phreng ba 'ching ba
T02D1347-1:169b-24: rol na'o // bzhin no // gling ni zla ba
T02D1347-1:169b-25: 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni
T02D1347-1:169b-28: drag po yang ni longs spyod ste bdun pa 'dzam
T02D1347-1:169b-29: bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyi sa
T02D1347-1:169b-30: bdun pa 'dzam bu'i gling chen po zlum po'i rnam
T02D1347-1:169b-31: pa zheng du dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig dang khor
T02D1347-1:169b-32: yug tu 'bum phrag gsum yod pa gang du mi
T02D1347-1:169b-33: rnams gnas pa de ni las kyi sa dang /
T02D1347-1:169b-34: drug ni longs spyod kyi sar rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-35: 'dzam bu'i gling ni lan tshva'i rgya mtsho'i ngogs na ste /
T02D1347-1:169b-36: lhag ma ni chang la sogs pa'i ngogs na'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-37: da ni 'dzam gling chen po la gling bzhi rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:169b-38: shar du rlung ni shin tu zlum po zhes pa
T02D1347-1:169b-39: ni shar du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:169b-40: gyis shin tu zlum po ste zla ba nya ba'i
T02D1347-1:169b-41: rnam pa'o // lho ru me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis gru gsum mo //
T02D1347-1:169b-42: byang du chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis zlum po phyed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:169b-43: nub tu sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis gru bzhi ste chu yi gter gyi zur zhes so //
T02D1347-1:170a-0: dbus su lhun po stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis thig le'i rnam @170a * //
T02D1347-1:170a-2: / rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su'o zhes pa ni shar dang /
T02D1347-1:170a-3: lho dang byang dang nub kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su lhun po'o //
T02D1347-1:170a-4: sa'i steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri
T02D1347-1:170a-5: dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu 'gyur
T02D1347-1:170a-6: // dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi po 'di rnams kyi
T02D1347-1:170a-7: dpag tshad kyi tshad ni grangs bzhin du sa'i steng
T02D1347-1:170a-8: du ri zhes pa stong phrag bdun no //
T02D1347-1:170a-9: klu zhes pa stong phrag brgyad do //
T02D1347-1:170a-10: gza' zhes pa stong phrag dgu'o //
T02D1347-1:170a-11: phyogs zhes pa stong phrag bcu ste gling bzhi rnams kyi dpag tshad kyi tshad rim pa bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:170a-12: 'dir gang zhig shar zlum po phyed dang nub gru
T02D1347-1:170a-13: bzhi yin pa de'i phyir rang gi lus rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:170a-14: gyis mdun dang rgyab rlung dang /
T02D1347-1:170a-16: g-yon dang g-yas kyi lus ni chu dang me'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:170a-17: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rnam pas gling bzhi rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-1:170a-18: da ni lhun po la sogs pa rnams kyi rgya'i tshad gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:170a-19: lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya shar dang nub
T02D1347-1:170a-20: dang byang dang lho'i cha'i bar du stong phrag lnga
T02D1347-1:170a-21: bcu'o // sa gzhi dag gi gnas la rgyar stong phrag bcu drug go //
T02D1347-1:170a-22: stong phrag gcig ni khor yug dag gi yang dag pa'i zhing ngo //
T02D1347-1:170a-23: rva ni lnga po rnams dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la ni phyir son pa'o //
T02D1347-1:170a-24: phyogs kun du ni khor yug kyang ngo //
T02D1347-1:170a-25: de'i phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang zhes
T02D1347-1:170a-26: pa ni khor yug de'i phyi rol rva bzhi'i khang
T02D1347-1:170a-27: skyibs kyi gnas su gling drug dang mtsho drug dang
T02D1347-1:170a-28: ri drug ste de rnams las kha ba'i ri dang
T02D1347-1:170a-29: rva mnyam pa'o // bdun pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling
T02D1347-1:170a-30: ste de'i phyi rol na lan tshva'i chu gter gyi
T02D1347-1:170a-31: dkyil 'khor dang thams cad nas me'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D1347-1:170a-33: chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba
T02D1347-1:170a-34: zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re
T02D1347-1:170a-35: ste zhes pa ni rgya mtsho drug ste /
T02D1347-1:170a-36: rgya mtsho so so la bcu gcig lhag pa'i brgyas
T02D1347-1:170a-37: dman pa'i stong phrag tu 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don
T02D1347-1:170a-38: to // de bzhin du gling rnams drug dang ri
T02D1347-1:170a-39: rgyud mchog rnams drug nyid de gling dang ri dang
T02D1347-1:170a-40: to // / rgya mtsho bco brgyad po 'di rnams tshad mnyam mo //
T02D1347-1:170a-41: de nyid zhing mor ni stong phrag bcu drug las
T02D1347-1:170a-42: bco brgyad kyis thob pa'i chas gsal bar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:170b-0: // @170b zla ba zla ba gcig gis dman pa
T02D1347-1:170b-1: zhes pa ni rtsis de'i tshad mdor bsdus te brjod
T02D1347-1:170b-2: // pa'o // 'dir lhun po'i 'og gi cha la
T02D1347-1:170b-3: tshangs pa'i gnas nas phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad
T02D1347-1:170b-4: stong phrag brgyad dang khor yug gi gcig go //
T02D1347-1:170b-5: dpag tshad stong phrag dgu'i phyi rol dpag tshad stong
T02D1347-1:170b-6: phrag bcu drug gi bar du gling drug la sogs
T02D1347-1:170b-8: de'i phyir stong phrag bcu drug las bco brgyad kyis thob pa'i chas tshad gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:170b-9: de'i phyi rol lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du stong phrag
T02D1347-1:170b-10: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni 'dzam bu'i gling chen po'i
T02D1347-1:170b-11: yangs pa ste zlum po'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1347-1:170b-12: de'i phyi rol phyogs thams cad du lan tshva'i chu gter 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:170b-13: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma
T02D1347-1:170b-14: dag gi me'i dkyil 'khor dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:170b-15: gyi tshad dag de bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:170b-16: de ltar na lhun po tshangs pa'i gnas nas phyogs
T02D1347-1:170b-17: thams cad du dpag tshad 'bun phrag gnyis gnyis su
T02D1347-1:170b-18: 'gyur te / lus la brang gi phyed ni sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-1:170b-19: dpung pa ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-1:170b-20: nye ba'i dpung pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-1:170b-21: nor bu'i ching ba nas lag pa'i mthar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1347-1:170b-22: de ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad do ;
T02D1347-1:170b-23: / da ni tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor
T02D1347-1:170b-24: lo zhes pa la sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:170b-25: dang lha dang klu dang gnas dang /
T02D1347-1:170b-26: nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:170b-27: phyi rol du tshangs pa'i gnas dang lus la gtsug
T02D1347-1:170b-28: tor gyi nor bu la dus kyi 'khor lo ste
T02D1347-1:170b-29: / de nyid ni rgyal ba mchog bcas yang dag bstod pa ste /
T02D1347-1:170b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad dang bcas pa 'dus shing gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa dang /
T02D1347-1:170b-31: lha'i tshogs byang chub sems dpa' dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par bstod pa'o //
T02D1347-1:170b-32: lhun po la ni tshig [?] mda' tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi tshogs so //
T02D1347-1:170b-33: sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'i tshogs so //
T02D1347-1:170b-34: dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du ste /
T02D1347-1:170b-35: phyogs brgyad du sa'i dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams
T02D1347-1:170b-36: kun dang nye ba'i gnas zhes pa la gnas ni
T02D1347-1:171a-1: me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa /
T02D1347-1:171a-2: shar gyi lus 'phags dang 'dzam bu'i gling chung ngu
T02D1347-1:171a-3: dang byang gi sgra mi snyan dang nub kyi ba
T02D1347-1:171a-4: lang spyod do // nye ba'i gnas ni rang bzhin de nyid kyis phyogs mtshams rnams su ste /
T02D1347-1:171a-5: me dang bden bral dang dbang ldan dang /
T02D1347-1:171a-7: de bzhin du zhing dang nye ba'i zhing ni rgya mtsho'i phyed la'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-8: 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa ni rgya mtsho'i phyed gzhan la'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-9: 'dus pa can dang nye ba'i 'dus pa can ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-10: khang pa dang nye ba'i khang pa ni me'i phyed gzhan la'o ;
T02D1347-1:171a-11: / dur khrod dang nye ba'i dur khrod ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-12: dur khrod chen po brgyad ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' la ste /
T02D1347-1:171a-13: de ltar gnas la sogs pa rnams sa bcu gnyis su rig par bya ste /
T02D1347-1:171a-14: lus la yang sa bcu gnyis ni lag pa dang rkang pa dag gi tshigs bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:171a-15: da ni phyogs skyong rnams kyi gnas gsungs pa shar du brgya byin zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:171a-16: shar du brgya byin ni lhun po'i steng gi shar phyogs su brgya byin no //
T02D1347-1:171a-18: gshin rje'i phyogs su gshin rje'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-22: nor sbyin du gnod sbyin no //
T02D1347-1:171a-23: 'phrog byed kyi phyogs su drag po'o //
T02D1347-1:171a-26: brgya byin la sogs pa 'di dag mtshon ldan 'khor
T02D1347-1:171a-27: gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung
T02D1347-1:171a-29: de dag rnams kyi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:171a-30: rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa
T02D1347-1:171a-32: phyogs skyong rnams kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1347-1:171a-33: da ni sa dum bu bcu gnyis la 'khor los
T02D1347-1:171a-34: sgyur ba chen po 'khor ba gsungs pa lhun po'i
T02D1347-1:171a-35: rgyab kyi phyogs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-1:171a-36: lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi

T02D1347-1:175a-23: lhag pa'i brgyas dman pa ni lag pa gdengs can

T02D1347-1:175a-28: gnyis lhag pa'i brgyas dman pa'i lhag ma lo'i tshogs
T02D1347-1:175a-29: de nyid zla ba'i tshogs kyi don du nyi mas

T02D1347-1:175a-43: rtsa gnyis na lhag pa'i zla bar 'gyur te /

T02D1347-1:175b-14: gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la

T02D1347-1:175b-16: pa ste / 'dir zla ba dag pa gnas gsum

T02D1347-1:175b-19: gza'i chu tshod kyi don du lag pa rtse mo

T02D1347-1:176b-6: 'dir steng du skar ma'i tshogs dang 'og tu skar ma'i chu tshod kyi tshogs so //
T02D1347-1:176b-7: slar yang ma dag pa las kyang ma dag pa'i
