T02D1347-1:239a-19: bzhin te de ltar 'dab ma brgyad po rnams la
T02D1347-1:239a-20: srog gi nus pa de yi rang bzhin rten zhing
T02D1347-1:239a-22: dbang po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:239a-23: da ni mgrin pa'i 'khor lo gsung pa te 'dir
T02D1347-1:239a-24: snying kha'i padma'i steng du sor mo phyed dang bcas
T02D1347-1:239a-25: pa'i bcu gnyis kyi mthar mgrin pa'i 'khor lo la
T02D1347-1:239a-26: gza'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar 'khor lo yang
T02D1347-1:239a-27: dag gnas te / dbyug gu'i skar ma bzhi dang
T02D1347-1:239a-28: gtso bo'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de 'di
T02D1347-1:239a-29: rnams kyis 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-1:239a-30: dbyug gu'i rgyu skar bzhi dor nas 'dab ma nyi
T02D1347-1:239a-31: shu rtsa brgyad po rnams la nyin mtshan gyis srog
T02D1347-1:239a-33: dbyug gu drug cu las chas thob pa ni 'dab ma so so la srog yang dag par rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:239a-34: tshangs pa'i yul sa dpal ldan dpral ba dag nas
T02D1347-1:239a-35: dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i thig le dkar po
T02D1347-1:239a-36: zag / mgrin pa'i padma de'i yang steng du sor
T02D1347-1:239a-37: mo phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis kyi mthar dpral
T02D1347-1:239a-38: ba'i padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma
T02D1347-1:239a-39: gnyis dor nas 'dab ma bcu bzhi po rnams la
T02D1347-1:239a-40: nyin mtshan gyis srog yang dag par rgyu ste /
T02D1347-1:239a-41: dbyug gu drug cu las bcu bzhi'i cha thob pas 'dab ma so so 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:239b-0: thig le dang rnam par bcas @239b pa ni lte
T02D1347-1:239b-1: ba la rig par bya ste zla ba'i rkang pa
T02D1347-1:239b-2: rgyu ba'o // slar yang lte ba'i 'khor lo la
T02D1347-1:239b-3: rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ni 'jigs ma la sogs
T02D1347-1:239b-5: snying khar brgyad ni ai da la sogs pa'i ming rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-1:239b-6: mgrin par tha skar la sogs pa'i ming dang stong pa bzhi'i ming rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-1:239b-7: dpral ba'i rtsa rnams la tshes gcig la sogs pa'i ming rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-1:239b-8: gtsug tor la thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas de nyid bzhi'i ming rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-1:239b-9: mgrin pa dang dpral ba'i padma'i 'dab ma 'di rnams
T02D1347-1:239b-10: la nang du gyur pa ni 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1347-1:239b-12: de bzhin du lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin
T02D1347-1:239b-13: pa dang dpral ba la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa
T02D1347-1:239b-14: ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi rang
T02D1347-1:239b-15: bzhin no // gtsug tor la 'dab ma bzhi pa ni stong pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:239b-16: lte bar 'dab ma bzhi pa ni ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:239b-17: gsang bar 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ste
T02D1347-1:239b-18: phyi rol gyi 'dab ma bcu drug rnams la dbyangs
T02D1347-1:239b-19: kyi rtsa'o // nang du 'dab ma bcu la phung po dang khams kyi rtsa'o //
T02D1347-1:239b-20: de las nang gi 'dab ma rnams la stong pa drug gi rtsa'o //
T02D1347-1:239b-21: de ltar na 'khor lo drug po rnams kyi grangs
T02D1347-1:239b-22: ni lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig
T02D1347-1:239b-23: ste 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo drug po rnams
T02D1347-1:239b-26: da ni rtsa ba zhes pa la sogs pas sna
T02D1347-1:239b-27: bug gnyis las dkyil 'khor lnga rab tu 'bab pa
T02D1347-1:239b-28: gsungs te / 'dir sna bug g-yon pa dang g-yas
T02D1347-1:239b-29: pa dag la rtsa ba ste 'og gi char sa'i
T02D1347-1:239b-31: sna bug g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag la g-yon du chu 'bab bo //
T02D1347-1:239b-32: dbus kyi re kh'a la mngon par phyogs pa'i sna'i
T02D1347-1:239b-33: bug pa gnyis te thams cad kyi byang na lhun
T02D1347-1:239b-34: po'o zhes pa'i shes par byed pa las so //
T02D1347-1:239b-35: g-yas su bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor dag ni rab tu 'bab ste /
T02D1347-1:239b-36: g-yas dang byang gnyis ka'i phyi rol gyi sna'i bug pa'i cha'o //
T02D1347-1:239b-37: sna bug gnyis ka'i steng du rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bab bo //
T02D1347-1:239b-38: sna bug gnyis kyi dbus su nam mkha' ste sa
T02D1347-1:239b-39: dang chu dang me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1347-1:240a-2: g-yon gyi dus sbyor rgyu ba la g-yon dang g-yas
T02D1347-1:240a-3: kyi dus sbyor rgyu ba la g-yas nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:240a-5: slar yang sna bug gnyis la cig car du mnyam
T02D1347-1:240a-6: pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'bab ste srog gi
T02D1347-1:240a-7: nus pa'o // 'di dag rnams ni 'bugs te zhes pa ni lte ba dang /
T02D1347-1:240a-12: sna bug gi dkyil 'khor rnams dbyug gu dang /
T02D1347-1:240a-13: khyim dang thun tshod dang rgyu skar dang tshes grangs
T02D1347-1:240a-14: dang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbye ba dag gis
T02D1347-1:240a-16: nus pa ni srog gi nus pa 'gro ste mchog gi gnas ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D1347-1:240a-17: bcu gnyis mtha' ni sor bcu gnyis kyi mtha'o //
T02D1347-1:240a-18: cha yi mthar ni sor bcu drug gi mthar ro //
T02D1347-1:240a-19: 'dir sa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa'i rlung ni
T02D1347-1:240a-20: sna bug nas sor bcu gnyis kyi mthar 'gro ste
T02D1347-1:240a-22: chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rlung ni sor bcu gsum 'gro ste de nas ldog go //
T02D1347-1:240a-23: me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rlung ni sor bcu bzhi 'gro ste de nas ldog go //
T02D1347-1:240a-24: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi rlung ni sor bcva lnga 'gro ste de nas ldog go //
T02D1347-1:240a-25: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rlung ni sor bcu drug 'gro ste de nas ldog go //
T02D1347-1:240a-26: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rlung sa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:240a-27: gyi mthar de dag gi dbus su rab tu zhugs
T02D1347-1:240a-28: pa ni sna bug gnyis nas sor bcu gnyis 'bab
T02D1347-1:240a-29: bo // nam mkha'i mthar dbu mar zhugs pa'i sor bcu drug 'bab bo //
T02D1347-1:240a-30: 'dir gang gi tshe phyi rol du 'phel bar gyur pa de'i tshe nang du thung ngur 'gyur ro ;
T02D1347-1:240a-31: / gang gi tshe bcu drug la sogs pa las
T02D1347-1:240a-32: phyi rol du thung ngur 'gyur ba de'i tshe rlung
T02D1347-1:240a-33: gi rtsa'i dbang gis lte bar sor mo bzhi 'phel
T02D1347-1:240a-34: bar 'gyur te / srog gi nus pa 'bab pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:240a-35: da ni zhing zhes pa la sogs pas zhing la sogs pa rnams gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:240a-36: 'di ltar lus kyi dpung pa'i tshigs gnyis la zhing gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:240a-37: brla'i tshigs gnyis la nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02D1347-1:240a-38: nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs gnyis la tshan do ha gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:240a-39: pus mo'i tshigs gnyis la nye ba'i tshan do ha'o //
T02D1347-1:240a-40: lag pa'i tshigs gnyis la 'dus pa'o //
T02D1347-1:240b-0: rkang pa'i tshigs gnyis la @240b nye ba'i 'dus pa'o //
T02D1347-1:240b-1: lag pa'i mthil gnyis la dur khrod gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:240b-2: rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la nye ba'i dur khrod gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:240b-3: lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo la dur khrod chen po bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:240b-4: rkang pa gnyis kyi sor mo la nye ba'i dur
T02D1347-1:240b-5: khrod chen po bzhi ste zhing la sogs pa'i nges
T02D1347-1:240b-6: pa'o // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi
T02D1347-1:240b-7: 'khor lo'i 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su
T02D1347-1:240b-8: 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med
T02D1347-1:240b-9: pa'i 'od las kun 'byung gi bden pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:240b-10: pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1347-1:240b-12: // / da ni 'khor lo can zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:240b-13: pas 'khor los sgyur ba dang kla klo'i 'khrug pa
T02D1347-1:240b-14: rang gi lus la gsungs te 'dir rang gi lus
T02D1347-1:240b-16: phyi rol du le'u dang po las gsungs pa'i 'khor
T02D1347-1:240b-17: lo can gang yin pa de ni lus la rdo
T02D1347-1:240b-18: rje can te thugs rdo rje'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D1347-1:240b-19: // lha mchog bdag po dbang phyug la sogs pa
T02D1347-1:240b-20: bcu gnyis rnams gang yin pa de dag ni yan
T02D1347-1:240b-21: lag bcu gnyis 'gog pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:240b-22: rigs ldan gang yin pa de ni lus la yang dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1347-1:240b-23: ni zhes pa ni rgyu de las so //
T02D1347-1:240b-24: phyi rol du glang po rta dang shing rta mngag gzhug pa gang yin pa de dag lus la /
T02D1347-1:240b-25: 'phags pa'i tshad med pa bzhi rnams so //
T02D1347-1:240b-26: phyi rol du drag po gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-1:240b-27: lus la rang rgyal gyi ye shes kyi ming can
T02D1347-1:240b-28: no // phyi rol du ha nu m'an gang yin
T02D1347-1:240b-29: pa de ni nyan thos kyi ye shes te rang
T02D1347-1:240b-30: gi lus la 'khor lo can 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D1347-1:240b-32: de bzhin du phyi rol du gdug pa kla klo'i
T02D1347-1:240b-33: dbang po gang yin pa de ni lus la sdig
T02D1347-1:240b-34: pa'i sems so // phyi rol du byed pa'i blo
T02D1347-1:240b-35: gros sdug bsngal sbyin byed gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-1:240b-36: lus la mi dge ba'i lam mo //
T02D1347-1:240b-38: gnas pa gang yin pa de ni lus la ma rig pa 'jug pa'o //
T02D1347-1:240b-39: phyi rol du lha min dpung glang po dang rta
T02D1347-1:240b-40: dang shing rta dang rkang thang rnams gang yin pa
T02D1347-1:240b-41: de ni lus la bdud kyi phyogs rnam pa bzhi'o
T02D1347-1:240b-42: // phyi rol du de'i g-yul la kla klo rnams
T02D1347-1:240b-43: sdud pa de ni rang gi lus la srid pa'i
T02D1347-1:240b-45: phyi rol du 'khor lo can chen po dang rigs
T02D1347-1:240b-46: ldan gyi dpal ldan rgyal ba gang yin pa de
T02D1347-1:241a-1: gi lus la thar pa'i lam rnyed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:241a-2: phyi rol du kee l'a shar 'khor lo can chen
T02D1347-1:241a-3: po'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-1:241a-4: rang gi lus la srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa'o
T02D1347-1:241a-5: // phyi rol du rdzas kyis gang ba'i sa gzhi
T02D1347-1:241a-6: gang yin pa de ni lus la khams kyi tshogs
T02D1347-1:241a-8: phyi rol du 'khor lo can gyi sras tshangs pa
T02D1347-1:241a-9: dang lha'i dbang por gyur pa rgyab kyi dum bu
T02D1347-1:241a-10: gcig tu chos ston par byed pa dang /
T02D1347-1:241a-11: mdun te mdun gyi dum bur kla klo'i chos zad
T02D1347-1:241a-12: pa don du gnyer ba gang yin pa 'jam dpal
T02D1347-1:241a-13: te de dang 'jig rten mgon po srid pa gsum
T02D1347-1:241a-14: las rnam par rgyal ba de ni rang gi lus
T02D1347-1:241a-15: la dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub kyi sems bde
T02D1347-1:241a-16: ba ster ba'am smon pa'i sems dang 'jug pa'i sems
T02D1347-1:241a-17: so // rgyab kyi dum bur tshangs pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:241a-18: pa'i rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de
T02D1347-1:241a-19: dag ni rang gi lus la du ma'i sangs rgyas
T02D1347-1:241a-20: rnam par dag pa phung po dang khams dang skye
T02D1347-1:241a-21: mched rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:241a-22: de ltar kla klo dbang po'i 'khrug par 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:241a-23: nges par lus can rnams kyis lus kyi dbus su'o
T02D1347-1:241a-24: // sgyu ma'i gzugs kyang phyi rol du ni nges
T02D1347-1:241a-25: par mkha'i yul du kla klo 'khrug ste 'khrug pa
T02D1347-1:241a-27: 'di ni rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ba'i le'u lnga
T02D1347-1:241a-28: par mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes grub pa
T02D1347-1:241a-30: da ni dus kyi lo zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-1:241a-31: dbu ma'i phyogs gsum dang lo gsum gyi dbye ba
T02D1347-1:241a-32: dag gis rigs gsum la sogs pas 'dus pa la
T02D1347-1:241a-33: sogs pa gsungs te 'dir dus kyi lo ni rtsa
T02D1347-1:241a-34: dbu ma'i lo'o // me grangs ni lo gsum gyi grangs so //
T02D1347-1:241a-35: lo yi nyin zhag tshogs kyis bsgyur ba ni nyin
T02D1347-1:241a-36: zhag sum brgya drug cus bsgyur bar 'gyur ba ste
T02D1347-1:241a-37: nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:241a-38: lo gsum po de nyid rigs gsum ste sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rigs so //
T02D1347-1:241a-39: lo'i dbye bas snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:241a-40: nyin zhag gi tshogs de las bgrod pa'i dbye ba
T02D1347-1:241a-41: brgya brgyad cu'i chas thob pa ni rigs drug tu
T02D1347-1:241a-42: 'gyur ro // slar yang nyin zhag gi tshogs de
T02D1347-1:241a-43: las zla ba'i dbye bas te sum cu'i chas thob
T02D1347-1:241a-44: pa ni rigs sum cu rtsa drug tu 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:241b-0: 'gyur ro // / ro yis bsgyur @241b ba'i ro zhes pa drug gis bsgyur ba'i drug ni /
T02D1347-1:241b-2: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs so //
T02D1347-1:241b-5: nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad cu po de las
T02D1347-1:241b-6: gza' yis bcad pas thob pa ni rab gsal nges
T02D1347-1:241b-7: par dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams
T02D1347-1:241b-8: te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig
T02D1347-1:241b-9: go // lhag ma shes rab dang thabs zung zhig
T02D1347-1:241b-10: ste de ltar na lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i
T02D1347-1:241b-11: brgya phrag gcig ni dus kyi 'khor lo ste bdun
T02D1347-1:241b-12: gyi cha'i lhag ma ni rigs ldan gyi gnas kyi
T02D1347-1:241b-13: go // lhag pa'i lha'o // lha dang lha mo'i 'khor lo dang rigs ldan gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-1:241b-14: slar yang sngar gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs stong brgyad
T02D1347-1:241b-15: cu po de las phyogs kyis bcad pa mngon par
T02D1347-1:241b-16: brjod pa zhes pa ni bcva lnga'i chas thob pa
T02D1347-1:241b-17: ni lha dang lha mo rnams kyis mngon par brjod
T02D1347-1:241b-18: par 'gyur te / dus kyi 'khor lo'i bdag po
T02D1347-1:241b-19: zung dang lhan cig bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni lha
T02D1347-1:241b-20: dang lha mo'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa ni lo
T02D1347-1:241b-21: gsum gyi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi nges
T02D1347-1:241b-22: par 'gyur te / pa'o // 'jig rten gyi kun
T02D1347-1:241b-23: rdzob kyis rigs gsum dang rigs drug dang rigs sum
T02D1347-1:241b-24: cu rtsa drug gi rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud de rnal
T02D1347-1:241b-26: / da ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes pa la
T02D1347-1:241b-27: sogs pas bya ba'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1347-1:241b-28: rgyud rnams rnam pa gsum dang drug gi dbye bas
T02D1347-1:241b-29: gsungs te / 'dir dbu ma'i phyogs gsum gyi nyin
T02D1347-1:241b-30: hag ni nyin zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste nyin
T02D1347-1:241b-31: zhag so so la dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi dbye
T02D1347-1:241b-32: bas bcu gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyin zhag gi
T02D1347-1:241b-33: yan lag bzhi bcu'i lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i grangs su
T02D1347-1:241b-34: gsungs te / 'gyur ro // nyin zhag gi yan
T02D1347-1:241b-35: lag bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya po de las
T02D1347-1:241b-36: tha dad du byas pa ni skyu 'phrul dra ba
T02D1347-1:241b-37: rnam pa gsum du yang 'gyur te bug pa rig
T02D1347-1:241b-38: byed ces pa lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa dgus gcig
T02D1347-1:241b-40: slar yang 'byung ba rgya mtshos 'gyur zhes pa ni
T02D1347-1:241b-41: lha zung bzhi bcu rtsa lngas gnyis par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:241b-43: // me dang chu gter gyis te lha zung bzhi
T02D1347-1:241b-44: bcu rtsa gsum gyis gzhan du'o //
T02D1347-1:241b-45: nyin zhag gi yan lag 'di las tha dad du
T02D1347-1:242a-0: byas pa rnams ni gsum gyi dbye bas @242a *
T02D1347-1:242a-1: // sum cu rtsa bdun lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:242a-2: lha dang lha mo rnams ni nyis 'gyur te bdun
T02D1347-1:242a-3: cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i nyis brgya'i grangs su 'gyur
T02D1347-1:242a-4: ro zhes pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i nges pa ste
T02D1347-1:242a-5: / 'di'i spros pa'i don ni le'u lnga pa las
T02D1347-1:242a-6: brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba
T02D1347-1:242a-7: bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:242a-8: da ni 'dus pa rnam pa drug gi dbye ba gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:242a-9: tha dad du byas pa'i lhag pa'i nyin zhag gi
T02D1347-1:242a-10: yan lag de las dpal ldan 'dus pa dus kyi
T02D1347-1:242a-11: dbye ba ni zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:242a-12: de nyid ces bya zhes pa ni nyin zhag gi
T02D1347-1:242a-13: yan lag de las tha dad du byas pa'i lha
T02D1347-1:242a-14: zung nyi shu rtsa lngas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
T02D1347-1:242a-16: lha bcu dgu tha dad du byas pas nyi shu
T02D1347-1:242a-17: rtsa lnga po 'di las drug gis dman pa gzhan
T02D1347-1:242a-18: bcu dgu'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:242a-19: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang bcu dgu'i bdag
T02D1347-1:242a-20: nyid de dag gi phyed kyi dbye bas rnam par
T02D1347-1:242a-21: phye ba ni dbye ba gzhan du yang 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:242a-22: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i phyed ni phyed dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-1:242a-23: bcu gnyis so // bcu dgu'i phyed ni phyed dang
T02D1347-1:242a-24: bcas pa'i dgu ste 'di las phyed ni phyed dang
T02D1347-1:242a-25: bcas pa'i bcu gnyis la 'jug go //
T02D1347-1:242a-26: de la gcig ni dgu'i bdag nyid du 'dus pa'o //
T02D1347-1:242a-27: gzhan ni bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-1:242a-28: slar yang bsres pa ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba gzhan
T02D1347-1:242a-29: gnyis su 'gyur te bcu gsum zhes pa ni bcu
T02D1347-1:242a-30: dang gsum mo // bcu dgu ni nyi shur gcig
T02D1347-1:242a-31: gis [?] mtshang ba ste bcu gsum dang bcu dgu
T02D1347-1:242a-32: po 'di dag gis kyang lha zung sum bcu rtsa
T02D1347-1:242a-34: / bug pa ste dgu dang de nyid bcas te
T02D1347-1:242a-35: nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa ni lha zung
T02D1347-1:242a-36: sum cu rtsa bzhis 'dus pa gnyis par 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:242a-37: de ltar 'dus pa drug gi dbye ba tha dad
T02D1347-1:242a-38: do // rgyud kyi rgyal po drug po'i de [?]
T02D1347-1:242a-39: dag la lha zung gi grangs sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1347-1:242a-41: nyis 'gyur ni lha dang lha mo'i grangs te drug cu rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya phrag gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:242a-42: de ltar na 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D1347-1:242a-43: rgyud kyi rgyal po dgu pa rnams la bdag po
T02D1347-1:242a-44: zung dang bcas pa bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga brgya'i
T02D1347-1:242a-45: nyin zhag gi yan lag gi grangs kyi lha dang
T02D1347-1:242b-0: rgyud @242b 'di rnams la phung po dang khams dang
T02D1347-1:242b-1: skye mched dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i rkang pa
T02D1347-1:242b-2: rdzogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa ni mngal du
T02D1347-1:242b-3: ji lta ba de bzhin du le'u lnga pa las
T02D1347-1:242b-4: gdan gyi dbye bas brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D1347-1:242b-5: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:242b-6: 'dir mngal nas skyes pa'i phung po dang khams rdzogs pa ni dgu'i bdag nyid kyi 'dus pa'o //
T02D1347-1:242b-7: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang lhan cig
T02D1347-1:242b-8: skyes pa dang chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang
T02D1347-1:242b-9: sprul pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs pa ni bcu gsum gyi
T02D1347-1:242b-10: bdag nyid do // de bzhin du phung po dang
T02D1347-1:242b-11: khams dang 'khor lo dang yul rdzogs pa ni bcu
T02D1347-1:242b-13: / de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor
T02D1347-1:242b-14: lo dang yul dang mig la sogs pa drug rdzogs
T02D1347-1:242b-15: pa ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-1:242b-16: de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:242b-17: dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi dbang po
T02D1347-1:242b-18: bzhi dang gsang ba dang gtsug tor gyi padma rdzogs
T02D1347-1:242b-19: pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid do
T02D1347-1:242b-20: // de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang 'khor
T02D1347-1:242b-21: lo drug dang yul dang dbang po dang las kyi
T02D1347-1:242b-22: dbang po dang mchog gi dbang po dang dga' ba
T02D1347-1:242b-23: rdzogs pa ni sum cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1347-1:242b-24: // 'dus pa'o // mngal bzung nas lo bcu drug
T02D1347-1:242b-25: gi mtshams kyi bar du byis pa rnams rnam pa
T02D1347-1:242b-26: drug tu 'byung ba ni 'dus pa'i nges pa ste
T02D1347-1:242b-27: le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:242b-28: de bzhin du sgyu 'phrul dra ba la phung po dang /
T02D1347-1:242b-29: khams dgu dang [?] spu la sogs pa'i khams brgyad
T02D1347-1:242b-30: dang skye mched bcu gnyis 'khor lo bzhi dang bcas
T02D1347-1:242b-32: mkhris pa dang bad kan dang 'dus pa'i khams dang
T02D1347-1:242b-33: bcas pa'i las kyi dbang po drug ni bzhi bcu
T02D1347-1:242b-34: rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o
T02D1347-1:242b-35: // gtsug tor dang gsang ba'i padma dang bcas pa'i bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-1:242b-36: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang /
T02D1347-1:242b-37: nga rgyal dang bcas pa ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i
T02D1347-1:242b-38: bdag nyid do zhes pa ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
T02D1347-1:242b-39: nges pa ste le'u lnga pa las rgyas par brjod
T02D1347-1:242b-40: par bya'o // rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'byung ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:242b-41: da ni byi dang nang gi phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:243a-1: la rgyas gdab par bya ste 'bras bus kyang rgyu la rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-2: rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-3: khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-4: gzhan la ltos pa las khu ba'i chos can nyid kyi phyir zla ba ni shes rab ste rgyu'o ;
T02D1347-1:243a-5: / rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-6: de lta na thams cad du stong pa nyid ni shes rab ste rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-7: snying rje ni thabs te 'bras bu'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-8: 'dir gang zhig zla ba'i cha shas nyin zhag gi
T02D1347-1:243a-9: tshogs bzhi bcu rtsa lnga ste de dag las gza'
T02D1347-1:243a-10: yi cha yis thob pa nyin zhag drug ni rdo
T02D1347-1:243a-11: rje can gyi phyag rgya drug tu 'gyur te 'khor
T02D1347-1:243a-12: lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang gdu bu
T02D1347-1:243a-13: dang ske rags dang thal ba dang mchod phyir thogs
T02D1347-1:243a-14: pa ste dus kyi 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyag
T02D1347-1:243a-15: rgya'o // gzhan pa'i nyin zhag [?] tshogs te lhag
T02D1347-1:243a-16: ma gsum gyi grangs ni nang du rdo rje can
T02D1347-1:243a-17: gyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya ste phyi dang
T02D1347-1:243a-18: nang du phyag rgya dgur rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:243a-19: shes rab sku zhes pa ni shes rab kyi rgyud
T02D1347-1:243a-20: dang thabs kyi sku thabs kyi rgyud la dus sbyor
T02D1347-1:243a-21: gsum rnams ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i
T02D1347-1:243a-22: bdag nyid de sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag
T02D1347-1:243a-23: nyid do // rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1347-1:243a-24: rgyud las phyag rgya rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i
T02D1347-1:243a-25: nyid do // nges pa'o // da ni nus ma
T02D1347-1:243a-26: zhes pa la sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i lha
T02D1347-1:243a-27: dang lha mo'i grangs gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:243a-28: 'dir 'khor lo drug gi rtsa snga tshogs pa'i rang bzhin rnams lha'i tshogs so //
T02D1347-1:243a-29: nus ma khro bo rnams ni rim pas bcu ru
T02D1347-1:243a-30: rab tu 'gyur te zhes pa la pha rol tu
T02D1347-1:243a-31: phyin pa bcu ni nus ma bcu dang gtsug tor
T02D1347-1:243a-32: la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste so sor bcu'o
T02D1347-1:243a-33: // lnga ni sangs rgyas lha mo rnams zhes pa
T02D1347-1:243a-34: ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga
T02D1347-1:243a-35: dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs
T02D1347-1:243a-36: pa'i lha mo lnga ste so sor lnga'o ;
T02D1347-1:243a-37: / gzugs sogs mig la sogs pa drug ste zhes
T02D1347-1:243a-38: pa ni gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa
T02D1347-1:243a-39: drug dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa drug ste
T02D1347-1:243a-40: de bzhin du so sor drug go //
T02D1347-1:243a-41: slar yang lha'i tshogs ni drug gnyis so zhes pa
T02D1347-1:243a-42: ni dbang po la sogs pa bcu gnyis kyi grangs
T02D1347-1:243b-0: so // @243b rnal 'byor ma dang klu dang gtum
T02D1347-1:243b-1: mo brgyad ces pa ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs
T02D1347-1:243b-2: so // pa brgyad dang / mtha' yas la sogs pa brgyad dang /
T02D1347-1:243b-3: khyi gdong ma sogs pa brgyad de lha'i chogs 'di
T02D1347-1:243b-4: dag ni sgrub thabs kyi le'u las so sor ming
T02D1347-1:243b-5: gi dbye bas brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:243b-6: srid par zhes pa ni phyi rol dang nang du'o //
T02D1347-1:243b-7: slar yang 'di dag thams cad shes rab dang thabs
T02D1347-1:243b-8: kyi dbye bas nyis 'gyur te 'di dag dpal ldan
T02D1347-1:243b-9: dus kyi 'khor lo bzhi lhag brgya ste de yi
T02D1347-1:243b-10: phyed kyang lha lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1347-1:243b-11: do // de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i dbye
T02D1347-1:243b-12: bas te slar yang de dag gcig nyid kyis lha
T02D1347-1:243b-13: lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig gi
T02D1347-1:243b-14: bdag nyid kyi dus kyi 'khor lor rig par bya'o
T02D1347-1:243b-15: do // // padma'i lte ba la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:243b-16: da ni tsar tsi k'a la sogs pa'i padma'i 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:243b-17: nyi ma'i cha las te sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
T02D1347-1:243b-18: chas dbugs kyi 'khor lo las nyin zhag so sor
T02D1347-1:243b-19: chu tshod gnyis thob pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-1:243b-20: zla ba'i dbus su chu tshod drug cur 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:243b-21: rigs ldan gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:243b-22: de dag rnal 'byor ma ste dus sbyor bsres pa
T02D1347-1:243b-23: zhes pa la dus sbyor ni thun mtshams bzhi ste
T02D1347-1:243b-24: de dag rigs ldan la bsres pa ni drug cu
T02D1347-1:243b-26: de dag kyang shes rab dang thabs kyi dbye bas
T02D1347-1:243b-27: gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad lhag
T02D1347-1:243b-29: slar yang nyi ma'i cha las nyin zhag rab phye
T02D1347-1:243b-30: ste nyin zhag sum brgya drug cus rab tu phye
T02D1347-1:243b-31: ba ni nag pa la sogs pa'i tshes ni mtshan
T02D1347-1:243b-33: de nyid sgeg mo la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang
T02D1347-1:243b-34: bcas pa nyis 'gyur dag kyang nyi shu lhag pa'i
T02D1347-1:243b-35: bdun brgya'i grangs kyi lha'i tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:243b-36: mtha' dag bsdus par gyur pa zhes pa ni lha
T02D1347-1:243b-37: mo 'di dag mngon brjod rnams dang bcas pa ste
T02D1347-1:243b-38: / lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang bcas pa'i phyag
T02D1347-1:243b-39: rgya drug dang lhan cig pa ni nyi ma'i nyin
T02D1347-1:243b-40: zhag sum 'gyur lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi grangs
T02D1347-1:243b-41: / stong brgyad cu'o // rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la
T02D1347-1:243b-42: lo gsum gyi nyin zhag gi tshogs kyi lha dang
T02D1347-1:243b-43: lha mor rig par bya bar dgongs pa ste de
T02D1347-1:244a-0: ltar na nyi ma lo yi rab tu dbye @244a
T02D1347-1:244a-2: ri bong 'dzin pa la sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang /
T02D1347-1:244a-3: 'dus pa rnams pa dgu po mtha' dag phyogs kyi
T02D1347-1:244a-4: dbye ba ste lha'i tshogs bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga
T02D1347-1:244a-6: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha'i tshogs gcig
T02D1347-1:244a-7: tu gyur pa rnams kyis kyang dang po'i sangs rgyas
T02D1347-1:244a-8: su 'gyur ro // dang po'i sangs rgyas de la
T02D1347-1:244a-9: mkha' lag mi bdag rnams te nyi shu lhag pa'i
T02D1347-1:244a-10: brgya phrag bcu drug gi grangs so //
T02D1347-1:244a-11: lha dang lha mo de dag rnams kyi shes rab
T02D1347-1:244a-12: thabs dag mtshan ma nyin mo zhes pa ni grangs
T02D1347-1:244a-13: bzhin du shes rab mtshan mo'i cha dang thabs nyin
T02D1347-1:244a-14: mo'i cha'o // mnyam pa'i cha ste nyin phyed nas
T02D1347-1:244a-15: mtshan phyed dang mtshan phyed nas nyin phyed la rgyu
T02D1347-1:244a-16: skar phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gsum gyis te /
T02D1347-1:244a-17: dbyug gu'am chu tshod bcu lhag pa'i brgyad brgya rnams kyis mtshan mo'i cha'o //
T02D1347-1:244a-18: de bzhin du nyin mo'i cha ste dpal ldan rgyu
T02D1347-1:244a-19: skar gyi dkyil 'khor dang po'i sangs rgyas la lha'i
T02D1347-1:244a-20: tshogs rgyu skar gyi chu tshod kyi grangs kyi bdag
T02D1347-1:244a-21: nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1347-1:244a-22: phyi rol du skar ma'i chu tshod rnams gza' thams
T02D1347-1:244a-23: cad kyi longs spyod yin pa ji lta ba de
T02D1347-1:244a-24: bzhin du nang du sku dang gsung dang thugs dang
T02D1347-1:244a-25: ye shes ni dbang po drug gi chos rnams kyi'o
T02D1347-1:244a-26: // gang gis rang gi lus la shes par gyur pa ste /
T02D1347-1:244a-27: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas shes rab dang thabs
T02D1347-1:244a-28: kyi bdag nyid dang po'i sangs rgyas gang gis rang
T02D1347-1:244a-29: gi lus la nyin mtshan dus thun mtshams dang thun
T02D1347-1:244a-30: tshod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang zla ba 'pho
T02D1347-1:244a-31: ba'i dbye ba bcu gnyis rnams kyis shes par gyur
T02D1347-1:244a-32: pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ni dpal ldan 'jam pa'i
T02D1347-1:244a-33: rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sangs rgyas skye ba
T02D1347-1:244a-34: 'di nyid dag la'o zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i rgyud
T02D1347-1:244a-35: dang rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi lha 'byung ba'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-1:244a-36: // da ni sum cu zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-1:244a-37: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas 'di las bsdus pa'i
T02D1347-1:244a-39: 'dir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas nyi shu lhag
T02D1347-1:244a-40: pa'i brgya phrag bcu drug las sum cu'i cha yis
T02D1347-1:244a-41: thob pa ni lha lnga bcu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:244a-42: // slar yang gsum gyis bsgyur ba ste sku dang
T02D1347-1:244b-0: gsung dang thugs kyis bsgyur ba @244b ni drug cu
T02D1347-1:244b-1: rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:244b-2: de rnams las dkyil 'khor gyi lha ni lnga bcu
T02D1347-1:244b-3: rtsa bzhi lhag pa'i brgya'i grangs te dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1347-1:244b-4: gtso bo thabs dang shes rab zung zhig dang phyi
T02D1347-1:244b-5: rol gyi phyag rgya drug go //
T02D1347-1:244b-6: bcu'i chas mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las dus
T02D1347-1:244b-7: kyi 'khor lo 'byung ba ste ai da la sogs
T02D1347-1:244b-8: pa dung can ma'i mtha'i rtsa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1347-1:244b-9: phyi rol du ni drang ba'i don to //
T02D1347-1:244b-10: bsdus pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:244b-11: da ni 'khor lo dag gi rtsa rnams de bzhin
T02D1347-1:244b-12: nyid ces pa sogs pas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa
T02D1347-1:244b-13: rnams gsungs te / 'dir lus la rigs gsum gyi
T02D1347-1:244b-14: rtsa gsum ni lte ba dang gsang ba dang rdo
T02D1347-1:244b-15: rje nor bur lus dang ngag dang sems kyi thig
T02D1347-1:244b-17: de bzhin du rigs drug gi rtsa rnams ni la
T02D1347-1:244b-18: la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang aa ba dh'u
T02D1347-1:244b-19: t'i dang bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba
T02D1347-1:244b-21: de bzhin du rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi rtsa
T02D1347-1:244b-22: rnams ni gtsug tor la sogs pa 'khor lo drug
T02D1347-1:244b-24: sgra 'dzin pa gnyis dang rig pa 'dzin pa gnyis
T02D1347-1:244b-25: dang gzugs 'dzin pa gnyis dang ro 'dzin pa gnyis
T02D1347-1:244b-26: dang / dri 'dzin pa gnyis po 'di dag ni rtsa bcu'o //
T02D1347-1:244b-27: lte ba'i 'khor lo'i nang dang gzhan gyi zlum po
T02D1347-1:244b-28: rnams la 'pho ba bcu gnyis kyi rtsa rnams dang
T02D1347-1:244b-29: thun tshod brgyad kyi rtsa rnams te /
T02D1347-1:244b-30: de ltar thams cad rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi
T02D1347-1:244b-31: gtso mor 'gyur te ro'i rang bzhin can drug dang
T02D1347-1:244b-32: khams kyi rang bzhin can drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-33: dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-34: yul gyi rang bzhin can drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-35: las kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin can drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-36: las kyi dbang po'i yul gyi rang bzhin can drug go //
T02D1347-1:244b-37: de bzhin du gzugs 'jug par byed pa drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-38: tshor ba 'jug par byed pa drug dang 'du shes 'jug par byed pa drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-39: 'du byed 'jug par byed pa drug dang /
T02D1347-1:244b-40: rnam par shes pa 'jug par byed pa drug dang
T02D1347-1:244b-41: ye shes 'jug par byed pa drug ste rigs sum
T02D1347-1:244b-42: cu rtsa drug gi rtsa rnams kyang rten dang brten
T02D1347-1:244b-43: pa'i 'brel pas bdun cu rtsa gnyis so zhes shes
T02D1347-1:244b-44: par bya'o // de bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1347-1:245a-0: @245a * // gtsug tor la ni chu gter zhes pa ni 'dab
T02D1347-1:245a-1: ma bzhi'i gzugs can bzhi ste thun mtshams bzhi 'jug
T02D1347-1:245a-3: snying khar brgyad de zhes pa ni rtsa snar ma
T02D1347-1:245a-4: la sogs pa mnyam gnas pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-1:245a-5: kyi rten du gyur pa rnams te nyin zhag so
T02D1347-1:245a-6: sor thun gyi dbye bas gza' brgyad rgyu bar byed
T02D1347-1:245a-7: pa rnams so // 'dir 'og dang steng gi rtsa gnyis kyi rten pa ni rlung ngo //
T02D1347-1:245a-8: spyi bor mi bdag ces pa ni tshes bcu drug 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:245a-9: mgrin pa la yang so yi grangs zhes pa ni
T02D1347-1:245a-10: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo la rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-1:245a-11: brgyad dang dbyug gu'i skar ma bzhi 'jug par byed
T02D1347-1:245a-12: pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:245a-13: lte bar te lte ba'i padma la khyim gyi rtsa
T02D1347-1:245a-14: ba'i phyi rol du chu tshod kyi rtsa brgyad ni
T02D1347-1:245a-15: brgyad kyis bsgyur ba rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste
T02D1347-1:245a-16: dkyil 'khor drug cu 'bab par byed pa dang stong
T02D1347-1:245a-17: pa bzhi 'bab par byed pa ste dbyug gu drug
T02D1347-1:245a-18: cu rtsa bzhi 'bab par byed pa'o ;
T02D1347-1:245a-19: / nyis 'gyur mi bdag ces pa ni sum cu
T02D1347-1:245a-20: rtsa gnyis te gsang ba'i dbus su gsang ba'i padma'i
T02D1347-1:245a-21: rtsa khu ba la sogs pa'i khams sum cu rtsa
T02D1347-1:245a-22: gnyis 'jug par byed pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:245a-23: 'di rnams las rtsa drug ni 'khor lo 'gog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:245a-24: bcus yul 'gog par 'gyur te de rnams ni 'dus pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:245a-25: slar yang de dag nyis 'gyur ni bad kan gyi cha ste nyi shu'o //
T02D1347-1:245a-26: slar yang nyis 'gyur ni mkhris pa'i cha ste bzhi bcur 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:245a-27: slar yang de dag rlung gi cha brgyad cur 'gyur
T02D1347-1:245a-28: te de ltar 'khor lo drug po rnams la rtsa
T02D1347-1:245a-29: lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya rnam par gnas
T02D1347-1:245a-30: pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsar rtogs par bya'o
T02D1347-1:245a-31: // 'di dag nges par 'chi ba ster byed bla
T02D1347-1:245a-32: ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis tshe dang nad med dag
T02D1347-1:245a-33: // kyang ster / 'khor lo drug la dus kyi
T02D1347-1:245a-34: rtsa brjod pa rnams bla ma'i man ngag gis bsgoms
T02D1347-1:245a-35: par gyur na 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog ste rnal
T02D1347-1:245a-36: 'byor ba rnams kyi 'di la ngo mtshar med do
T02D1347-1:245a-37: // kyang ster / // gtsug tor la ni chu gter te bzhi'o //
T02D1347-1:245a-38: dpral bar rgya mtshos bsnun pa'i dus rnams zhes pa
T02D1347-1:245a-39: bcu drug ste rtsa nyi shu po 'di dag ni
T02D1347-1:245a-40: bad kan gyi khams rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
T02D1347-1:245a-41: mgrin par so dang zhes pa ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:245b-0: @245b snying kha'i chu skyes dag la mig gis bsgyur
T02D1347-1:245b-1: ba'i dus rnams zhes pa ni rtsa brgyad de rtsa
T02D1347-1:245b-2: bzhi bcu po 'di dag ni mkhris pa'i khams dgu
T02D1347-1:245b-4: lte ba dang gsang ba bdag la grangs bzhin du
T02D1347-1:245b-5: chu gter drug cu zhes pa ni rtsa drug cu

T02D1347-1:245b-7: padma'i phyi rol yongs su bskor ba la rtsa bcu
T02D1347-1:245b-8: rtsa bzhi'o // drug go // rtsa brgyad cu po
T02D1347-1:245b-9: 'di dag ni rlung gi khams rab tu 'khrugs pa'o
T02D1347-1:245b-10: rtsa bzhi'o // drug go // // gsang bar gzhan
T02D1347-1:245b-11: ni phyogs dang zhes pa ni yongs su bskor ba
T02D1347-1:245b-12: rtsa bzhi'o // drug go // // la rtsa bcu'o
T02D1347-1:245b-13: // gzhan drug kyang grangs bzhin du snying po'i yongs
T02D1347-1:245b-15: 'dus pa dag ste zhes pa ni 'dus pa rab tu 'khrug pa'o //
T02D1347-1:245b-16: 'gog pa'o zhes pa ni 'khor lo drug 'gog pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:245b-17: de ltar na lnga bcu rtsa drug gi lhag pa'i
T02D1347-1:245b-18: brgya ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rtsa lha dang lha
T02D1347-1:245b-19: mo'i rang bzhin gyis gnas pa byis pa rnams la
T02D1347-1:245b-20: 'chi ba ste bar byed pa ste ;
T02D1347-1:245b-21: rigs drug gi rtsa dang lhan cig drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-1:245b-22: gnyis lhag pa'i brgya'i dus kyi 'khor lo 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:245b-23: drug gi rtsa'i bdag nyid can bsgoms par gyur pa
T02D1347-1:245b-24: na rnal 'byor pa rnams la bde ba ster bar
T02D1347-1:245b-25: byed pa'o // slar yang rtsa drug cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1347-1:245b-26: lhag pa'i brgya po de dag gi rtsa so so
T02D1347-1:245b-27: la rlung bcu rab tu rgyu ba dang phung po
T02D1347-1:245b-28: dang khams bcu'i rang bzhin gyis rnam pa bcur 'gyur
T02D1347-1:245b-29: byed pa'o // ro // de ltar thams cad bcus
T02D1347-1:245b-30: bsgyur ba ni nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu
T02D1347-1:245b-31: drug gi grangs su 'gyur te rgyu skar nyi shu
T02D1347-1:245b-32: rtsa bdun gyi chu tshong 'bab pa rnams so //
T02D1347-1:245b-33: de bzhin du dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:245b-34: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la shes rab dang
T02D1347-1:245b-36: rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di las 'jig
T02D1347-1:245b-37: rten kun rdzob kyis bad kan la sogs pa'i khams
T02D1347-1:245b-38: 'bab pa'i lha rnams 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
T02D1347-1:245b-39: pa'am rang gi lus bsgrub pa'i slad du 'jam dpal
T02D1347-1:245b-40: gyis phyung ba ni 'khor lo drug gi gtso mo
T02D1347-1:245b-41: rnams so // dus kyis 'khor lo'i rtsa sdom pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:245b-42: da ni drug ces pa la sogs pas rigs drug gi rtsa bsrung ba gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:246a-0: 'dir lus la gang zhig rtsa drug gi 'khor lo 'gog par brjod pa rnams @246a * //
T02D1347-1:246a-1: gsum gyi lam la gnas pa ni steng du zla

T02D1347-1:246a-3: g-yas dang dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1347-1:246a-4: 'og tu zla ba dang nyi ma dang me yi
T02D1347-1:246a-5: dbye bas bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba'i
T02D1347-1:246a-7: de ni rnal 'byor pas lus la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-1:246a-8: gang gis zhe na bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis
T02D1347-1:246a-9: zhes pa la bla ma'i nges pa ni sbyar ba
T02D1347-1:246a-10: yan lag drug ste des 'chi ba las bsrung bar
T02D1347-1:246a-11: bya'o // gang zhig srog chags rnams la 'chi ba
T02D1347-1:246a-12: ster ba ni drug po 'di rnams la srog zhugs
T02D1347-1:246a-13: bya'o // pa'o // drug la gal te srog ni
T02D1347-1:246a-14: rab zhugs gyur na de tshe mi rnams kyi ni
T02D1347-1:246a-15: dus thams cad du 'chi ba 'joms par nges te
T02D1347-1:246a-16: bya'o // pa'o // mtha' gcig tu'o // drug po
T02D1347-1:246a-17: 'di dag gi nang nas phra mo ni dbu ma
T02D1347-1:246a-18: aa ba dh'u t'i ste phra mo de la srog
T02D1347-1:246a-19: ma zhugs par gyur na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis
T02D1347-1:246a-20: 'chi ba'i yul ni gang du gcod par byed de
T02D1347-1:246a-21: nges par 'chi ba'i yul gcod par mi byed do
T02D1347-1:246a-22: bya'o // pa'o // mtha' gcig tu'o // // bsdus
T02D1347-1:246a-23: pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i 'grel
T02D1347-1:246a-24: bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong

T02D1347-1:246a-27: pa dang dus kyi 'khor lo'i rigs kyi rgyud dang
T02D1347-1:246a-28: rtsa'i rigs 'byung ba'i mdor bsdus chen po ste gsum
T02D1347-1:246a-29: bya'o // pa'o // mtha' gcig tu'o // // pa'o / //

T02D1347-1:246a-33: lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i khyim gyi 'khor lo ste
T02D1347-1:246a-34: lug la sogs pa mi mnyam pa'i dus sbyor gyi

T02D1347-1:246a-37: gyi bdag nyid gcig gis bar du chod pa'i 'dab

T02D1347-1:246a-43: sna bug g-yas su srog yang dag par rgyu bar

T02D1347-1:246a-45: rnams nyin zhag so sor 'gyur ro //

T02D1347-1:246b-0: ba bcu gnyis te drug ni g-yon @246b gyi sna
T02D1347-1:246b-1: bug la'o // drug ni g-yas kyi sna bug la'o //

T02D1347-1:246b-3: lus la nad dang bral ba rnams ni khams mnyam

T02D1347-1:246b-7: mi mnyam pa de las srog mi mnyam pa ste /

T02D1347-1:246b-9: mtshan mor gal te 'bab na de'i tshe 'tsho bdag
T02D1347-1:246b-11: dbu ma'i lo brgya rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni mi rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i grangs su 'gyur ro //

T02D1347-1:246b-19: ngag la zla bgrod 'chi ba dus kyi 'khor lor

T02D1347-1:246b-31: de nas zla ba gsum pa ni mi 'bab bo //

T02D1347-1:246b-33: pa 'jug pa na g-yon pa'i rtsar nyin zhag gsum
T02D1347-1:246b-35: zla ba lnga pa de nas zla ba drug pa la mi 'bab bo //

T02D1347-1:246b-42: 'tsho ba'i zla ba sum cu rtsa drug las zla ba drug song ste /
T02D1347-1:246b-43: de nas 'dab ma de la srog gi rlung yang dag par rgyu ba med do //
T02D1347-1:247a-0: 'pho ba bcu gcig dang dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa drug @247a * //
T02D1347-1:247a-1: brgya lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis nyin mtshan du 'gyur te /

T02D1347-1:247a-12: byed de 'dab ma bcu la srog yang dag par

T02D1347-1:247a-15: gyi rtsar 'bab ste nyin zhag brgyad dang nyin zhag

T02D1347-1:247a-28: de bzhin du nyin zhag bcu gsum dang /

T02D1347-1:247b-33: snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas zla

T02D1347-1:247b-36: 'dir khyim gyi 'khor lo dgod pa ni khyim gyi

T02D1347-1:248a-1: rtsibs gnyis pa la 'chi ltas kyi nyin zhag drug

T02D1347-1:248a-3: no // de bzhin du rtsibs gsum pa la 'chi

T02D1347-1:248a-7: zla ba nyi shu rtsa gcig go //

T02D1347-1:248a-13: dgu pa la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bdun dang zla ba drug go //

T02D1347-1:248a-20: pa de'i nyin zhag gnyis ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis

T02D1347-1:248a-31: stobs dang rdul dang mun pa rnams bzung nas 'chi
T02D1347-1:248a-32: ltas kyi nyin zhag nges par bstan te /

T02D1347-1:248b-0: @248b de nas khyim bcu gnyis pa la g-yon gyi

T02D1347-1:248b-16: rdul zad pa'i don du nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa

T02D1347-1:248b-35: de nas bdun pa ni srog skye ba'i zla ba ste ka rka ta'o //

T02D1347-1:248b-39: de'i phyir ka rka ta ni srog gi skye ba'i gnas te nyi ma kho na'i ma yin no //

T02D1347-1:249a-1: 'char ba na nyi ma nub pa zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i dus so //
T02D1347-1:249a-2: rdzogs pa'i dus de nas srog phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te /

T02D1347-1:249a-48: ma bdun pa'i bar de srid du rim pas lo
T02D1347-1:249b-0: lo gsum @249b mig ri bong can gyis rtsa gsum 'dor ro //

T02D1347-1:249b-30: gyi 'dab ma de la lo gsum gyi nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:249b-31: gi tshogs stong brgyad cu'i nang nas /

T02D1347-1:250b-10: dus sbyor la skyes pa tshe thung ba rnams la

T02D1347-1:251a-1: rnams ni zla ba gsum gyis dbye bas chu tshod 'phel lo //
T02D1347-1:251a-2: de nas lo gsum dang phyogs gsum ni nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:251a-3: gi dbye bas 'phel lo zhes pa ni dus 'phel
T02D1347-1:251a-4: ba'i rigs pa'o // rigs pa 'di las mngal nas
T02D1347-1:251a-5: skyes pa'i byis pa gang zhig dus ma yin par
T02D1347-1:251a-10: nyi shu la sogs pas 'chi ba de la chu tshod lnga'i steng du chu tshod drug dang /
T02D1347-1:251a-11: bdun la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba'i rim pa ni don med pa ste /
T02D1347-1:251a-12: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo gsum 'chi ba'i mtshams yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-1:251a-13: 'dir gal te skyes pa'i zla ba gcig gi rjes su 'chi bar 'gyur na /
T02D1347-1:251a-14: de'i tshe skyes pa'i nyin zhag nas brtsams te /
T02D1347-1:251a-15: srog gi rlung rdzogs pa'i dus nas tshes phyogs mda' dang yon tan la sogs pa rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:251a-16: de bzhin du mngal nas skyes pa nas zla ba gnyis kyi mtha' dang /
T02D1347-1:251a-17: zla ba gsum gyi mtha' dang zla ba bzhi'i mtha' dang /
T02D1347-1:251a-18: zla ba drug gi mtha' dang /
T02D1347-1:251a-21: lo gsum gyi mthar 'chi ba ni /
T02D1347-1:251a-22: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum rgyu ba nas g-yas
T02D1347-1:251a-23: kyi rtsa la sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga
T02D1347-1:251a-24: zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag lnga rgyu ba dang
T02D1347-1:251a-25: / g-yon gyi rtsa la snying stobs la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-1:251a-26: yon tan gsum zad pa'i dbye bas nyin zhag gcig
T02D1347-1:251a-27: gi bar du lugs las bzlog pas so //
T02D1347-1:251a-28: de bzhin du lte ba la srog rab tu zhugs
T02D1347-1:251a-29: pa las mngal nas skyes pa'i nyin mtshan dang po
T02D1347-1:251a-30: la yang 'chi bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:251a-31: de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gnyis pa la srog
T02D1347-1:251a-32: 'char ba las nyin zhag gsum pa la 'chi ba'o
T02D1347-1:251a-33: // de bzhin du 'dab ma bcu gcig pa la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag drug pa la'o //
T02D1347-1:251a-34: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bcu pa la
T02D1347-1:251a-35: srog 'char ba las nyin zhag bcu gcig pa la'o
T02D1347-1:251a-36: // de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma dgu pa
T02D1347-1:251a-37: la srog 'char ba las nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-1:251a-38: // gcig pa la'o // de bzhin du rim pas
T02D1347-1:251a-39: khyim gyi 'dab ma brgyad pa la srog 'char ba
T02D1347-1:251a-40: las nyin zhag sum cu rtsa drug pa la'o //
T02D1347-1:251a-41: de bzhin du khyim gyi 'dab ma bdun pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba gnyis na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-0: de bzhin du 'dab ma drug pa la srog 'char ba las @251b zla ba gsum na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-1: de bzhin du lnga pa la srog 'char ba las zla ba bzhi na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-2: de bzhin du 'dab ma bzhi pa la nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:251b-3: nyi shur srog 'char ba las zla ba drug na'o
T02D1347-1:251b-4: // de bzhin du phyogs dang bcas par gsum pa la srog 'char ba las lo gcig na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-5: nyin zhag bcu gnyis pa la srog 'char ba las lo gnyis na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-6: dang po la srog 'char ba las lo gsum na'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-7: lo bzhi pa la nyin zhag ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D1347-1:251b-8: mngal nas skyes pa nas lo brgya'i mtshams kyi bar du'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-9: 'di ni nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa ste /
T02D1347-1:251b-10: nyi ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du snying stobs
T02D1347-1:251b-11: la sogs pa yon tan gsum gyi dbye bas mngal
T02D1347-1:251b-12: nas skyes pa la zla ba'i 'chi ltas kyi nges
T02D1347-1:251b-13: pa'o // de bzhin du phyi ma'i steng gi rna ba las dbang phyug gis smras pa /
T02D1347-1:251b-14: ji ltar g-yon pa de bzhin g-yas //
T02D1347-1:251b-15: de bzhin nyid du dbu ma yang //
T02D1347-1:251b-16: lo gsum mthar ni 'chi ba ster //
T02D1347-1:251b-18: gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang la lar nges pa yod do //
T02D1347-1:251b-19: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:251b-20: 'di ltar mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi las las nyin zhag gcig nas brtsams te /
T02D1347-1:251b-21: lo gsum gyi mthar nyin zhag so so la 'chi
T02D1347-1:251b-22: ba'i dbye bas stong brgyad cu'i dbye ba tha dad
T02D1347-1:251b-23: pa'i byis pa'i 'chi ba gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-1:251b-25: nyi ma'i lam 'di la nges pa med do //
T02D1347-1:251b-26: 'on kyang rtsa las dbugs rab rgyu ba'i 'chi ltas
T02D1347-1:251b-27: kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis srog gi grangs shes par
T02D1347-1:251b-28: byed do // de'i phyir 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo ni 'chi ba'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D1347-1:251b-29: khyim gyi 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams las srog gis dkyil
T02D1347-1:251b-30: 'khor lnga rgyu ba go rims kyis yongs su 'dor
T02D1347-1:251b-31: ro // de nas lte ba la rab tu zhugs
T02D1347-1:251b-32: pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi'o zhes pa ni rigs
T02D1347-1:251b-33: ro // pa'o // nyi ma'i dbu ma rab tu
T02D1347-1:251b-34: rgyu bas lo brgya'i mtshams su lo gsum gyi dus
T02D1347-1:251b-35: kyi mtshan nyid 'di ni yongs su brtags pas /
T02D1347-1:251b-36: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so zhes zer ro //
T02D1347-1:251b-37: de nyid ni zla ba'i phyogs gsum gyi chos kyis zla ba'i 'chi ltas su mi 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:252a-0: 'dir gang zhig zla ba'i chos kyis 'chi @252a * //
T02D1347-1:252a-1: ltas kyi 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba des na byis
T02D1347-1:252a-2: pa mi mkhas pa rnams kyis rab tu brtags pa'o
T02D1347-1:252a-3: // g-yon pa'i rtsa la zla ba'i chos las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba ji ltar med /
T02D1347-1:252a-4: g-yas pa la nyi ma rab tu rgyu ba las
T02D1347-1:252a-5: 'chi ltas kyi 'chi bar thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs
T02D1347-1:252a-6: so zhes pa ni mi shes pa rnams kyi tshig
T02D1347-1:252a-7: go // 'dir lo gsum gyi lhag pa'i lha ni nyi ma'i sgras srog gi rlung ste /
T02D1347-1:252a-8: phyogs gsum gyi bdag po zla ba'i sgras thur sel gyi rlung ngo //
T02D1347-1:252a-11: su shu mna rnams kyi bdag po ni srog dang nyi ma ste /
T02D1347-1:252a-12: lte ba las steng du rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-1:252a-15: khu ba'i rtsa rnams kyi bdag po ni thur sel te /
T02D1347-1:252a-16: lte ba las 'og tu rab tu rgyu ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-1:252a-17: de ltar na zla ba la 'og tu yon tan gsum dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-18: nyi ma la steng du dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-20: des na 'og dang steng gi rtsa dag las yon
T02D1347-1:252a-21: tan gsum gyi dbye bas g-yon pa la zla ba'i
T02D1347-1:252a-22: 'chi ltas dang / yon tan lnga'i dbye bas g-yas pa la nyi ma'i 'chi ltas so //
T02D1347-1:252a-23: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'chi ltas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:252a-24: da ni dus kyi lo zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-1:252a-25: dbu ma yongs su rdzogs pa'i dus su 'chi ba'i
T02D1347-1:252a-28: bud med rnams kyi lus la snying stobs dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-30: mun pa'i dbye bas srog rab tu rgyu ste /
T02D1347-1:252a-31: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu lhag pa'i lo
T02D1347-1:252a-32: dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du g-yon dang g-yas
T02D1347-1:252a-34: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyi bar ni dbu ma'i
T02D1347-1:252a-35: dus te tshe lo brgya pa'i mi rnams kyi nges
T02D1347-1:252a-36: pa'o // de la g-yon pa dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-38: dbu ma'i rtsa gsum gyi snying stobs dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-39: rdul dang mun pa'i rang bzhin can te /
T02D1347-1:252a-40: 'di rnams las 'chi ba ni mun pa'i rtsa la
T02D1347-1:252a-41: rgyu ba'i grangs srog dang thur sel gyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:252a-42: gyis bzung nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la mi
T02D1347-1:252a-43: mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis rgyu ste
T02D1347-1:252a-44: dus kyi lo ste lo gsum dang /
T02D1347-1:252a-45: phyogs gsum gyi bar du nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis zhes pa la /
T02D1347-1:252a-46: nyin zhag ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig ste /
T02D1347-1:252b-0: de dag gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis @252b ji srid
T02D1347-1:252b-1: srog zad par 'gyur ba de srid du 'pho zhing
T02D1347-1:252b-3: zla ba zhes bya ste g-yon pa'i lam dang /
T02D1347-1:252b-4: nyi ma'i lam g-yas pa la mi mnyam mnyam pa'i
T02D1347-1:252b-5: nyin zhag re re 'phel bas rim pas so zhes
T02D1347-1:252b-6: pa ni gal te lug la sogs pa mi mnyam
T02D1347-1:252b-7: pa'i dus sbyor la skyes par gyur na g-yon pa'i
T02D1347-1:252b-8: rtsa la nyin zhag gcig rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:252b-9: gal te glang la sogs pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor
T02D1347-1:252b-10: la skyes par gyur na g-yas pa la nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:252b-11: gnyis rgyu'o // de nas slar yang 'pho ba'i dbye
T02D1347-1:252b-12: ba ni mi mnyam mnyam pa'i nyin zhag rnams kyis
T02D1347-1:252b-13: g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i mjug dang /
T02D1347-1:252b-14: g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i mjug tu rgyu ba'i nyin
T02D1347-1:252b-15: zhag gi ched kyis byed pa ni bcu gnyis rtsibs
T02D1347-1:252b-16: kyi khyim gyi 'khor lo la rim pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-1:252b-17: lnga yongs su dor ba'i slad du ste /
T02D1347-1:252b-18: g-yon gyi rtsa la nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1347-1:252b-19: 'khor zad pa'i don du 'pho bar byed cing g-yas
T02D1347-1:252b-20: kyi rtsal [?] sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor zad
T02D1347-1:252b-21: pa'i don du 'pho bar byed do //
T02D1347-1:252b-22: 'dir g-yon pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:252b-23: 'pho ba'i nyin zhag rnams kyis lug la sogs pa
T02D1347-1:252b-24: mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma drug po rnams la stong
T02D1347-1:252b-25: pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gi rlung
T02D1347-1:252b-26: gis 'dor ro // g-yas pa la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag drug dang /
T02D1347-1:252b-27: 'pho ba'i nyin zhag drug rnams kyis glang la sogs
T02D1347-1:252b-28: pa mnyam pa'i dus sbyor drug po rnams la sa'i
T02D1347-1:252b-29: dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab pa srog gis 'dor ro
T02D1347-1:252b-30: // de bzhin du g-yon pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag bcu gcig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-31: g-yas pa la nyin zhag bcu gnyis kyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-32: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcu bdun gyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-33: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag bcva brgyad kyis me'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-34: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gsum gyis chu'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-35: g-yas pa'i 'dab ma la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhis rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:252b-36: slar yang g-yon pa'i 'dab ma drug la nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa dgus sa'i dkyil 'khor 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:253a-0: g-yas pa la nyin zhag gsum cus nam @253a * //
T02D1347-1:253a-2: de ltar mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:253a-3: rnams g-yon pa dang g-yas pa la rgyu ba dang
T02D1347-1:253a-4: / nyin zhag sum cu po rnams kyi 'pho ba'i
T02D1347-1:253a-5: nyin zhag sum cus dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi rtsa'i
T02D1347-1:253a-6: 'dab ma rnams la dkyil 'khor lnga yongs su 'dor
T02D1347-1:253a-7: / ro // de nas g-yon pa'i rtsa mi mnyam
T02D1347-1:253a-8: pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum
T02D1347-1:253a-10: 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gcig gis kyang snying stobs kyi khams zad do //
T02D1347-1:253a-11: g-yas pa'i rtsa la nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyu ba dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-12: 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang rdul gyi khams zad do //
T02D1347-1:253a-13: de nas mi mnyam pa'i 'dab ma la rgyu ba'i
T02D1347-1:253a-14: nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum dang 'pho ba'i nyin
T02D1347-1:253a-15: zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis mun pa'i khams zad
T02D1347-1:253a-16: de / de ltar bad kan gyi rtsa zad pa ni snying stobs kyi khams dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-17: mkhris pa'i rtsa zad pa ni rdul gyi khams dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-18: rlung gi rtsa zad pa ni mun pa'i khams zhes
T02D1347-1:253a-19: brjod de rgyu ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum
T02D1347-1:253a-20: dang 'pho ba'i nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis
T02D1347-1:253a-21: so // khyim gnyis ka'i nyin zhag bsdus pas nyin zhag gsum gyis dman pa'i lo gsum dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-22: phyogs gsum gyis nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis lhag pa'i brgya phrag bcu gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:253a-23: dkyil 'khor lnga dang snying stobs dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-24: rdul dang mun pa'i rtsa gcod pa ni srog gi rlung gis gnas yongs su 'dor ba ste /
T02D1347-1:253a-25: de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba dang ji
T02D1347-1:253a-26: srid lo gsum gyi nyin zhag rnams srog rgyu bas
T02D1347-1:253a-27: so // de nas gzhan ni sum cu dag dang
T02D1347-1:253a-28: ste mngal bzung ba'i zla ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs
T02D1347-1:253a-29: nyin zhag sum cu'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-30: 'tsho ba dag gi mtshan mo gsum gyi bar du
T02D1347-1:253a-31: g-yas pa'i rtsa la rgyu zhing 'pho ba thams cad
T02D1347-1:253a-32: med pas / nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
T02D1347-1:253a-33: bar du phung po dang khams rnams rnam par gcod
T02D1347-1:253a-34: med pas / pa ste / 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-35: sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-36: lus kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:253a-37: dri la sogs pa'i yul lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:253b-0: bshang lam la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang @253b po lnga dang /
T02D1347-1:253b-1: smra ba la sogs pa'i las kyi dbang po'i yul lnga ste /
T02D1347-1:253b-2: 'di dag rnams nyin zhag sum cu rtsa gsum gyis
T02D1347-1:253b-3: gcod cing phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba med
T02D1347-1:253b-4: par 'gyur ro // de nas dbugs kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:253b-5: zad pa'i don du nyin zhag gcig dbu ma la
T02D1347-1:253b-6: par 'gyur ro // 'jug go // phung po drug pa dang /
T02D1347-1:253b-10: las kyi dbang po drug pa dang /
T02D1347-1:253b-11: las kyi dbang po'i yul drug pa khu ba 'pho ba ni 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-1:253b-12: phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnam par gcad pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-13: da ni dbugs zhes pa la sogs pas skyes par
T02D1347-1:253b-14: gyur pa rnams kyi 'chi ba'i dbugs rgyu ba gsungs
T02D1347-1:253b-15: te / 'dir lus la dbugs kyi 'khor lo dang chu srang gi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1347-1:253b-16: chu tshod kyi 'khor lo dang nyin zhag gi 'khor
T02D1347-1:253b-17: lo ni phyi rol la ji lta ba de bzhin
T02D1347-1:253b-19: de la dbugs drug gi bdag nyid ni dbugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-20: chu srang drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu srang gi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-21: chu tshod drug cu'i bdag nyid ni chu tshod kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-22: nyin zhag stong brgyad cu'i bdag nyid ni 'chi ltas kyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-23: nyin zhag lnga bcu rtsa drug lhag pa'i brgya phrag
T02D1347-1:253b-24: bcu gcig gi bdag nyid ni dus kyi 'chi ba'i
T02D1347-1:253b-26: 'khor lo 'di rnams la 'chi ba ni dbugs kyi
T02D1347-1:253b-27: rang bzhin dang chu srang gi rang bzhin dang chu
T02D1347-1:253b-28: tshod kyi rang bzhin dang nyin zhag gi rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:253b-29: gyi rgyu ste / g-yon gyi rtsa dang g-yas kyi
T02D1347-1:253b-30: rtsa la grangs bzhin du re re lhag pas so
T02D1347-1:253b-31: gyi rgyu ste / // dang por re zhig dbugs
T02D1347-1:253b-32: rgyu ba ni bgrod pa'i yan lag las ni lo
T02D1347-1:253b-33: bdun dag gis zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:253b-34: 'dir skyes pa gang la lo brgya'i mtshams su 'chi
T02D1347-1:253b-35: ltas med na dus kyi 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1347-1:253b-36: ro // de'i bgrod pa gnyis ni g-yon pa'i rtsa
T02D1347-1:253b-37: dang g-yas pa'i rtsa la dkyil 'khor lnga 'bab pa
T02D1347-1:253b-38: can gyi srog gi rlung 'bab po //
T02D1347-1:253b-39: de nas bgrod pa gsum pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gcig rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:253b-41: de nas lo gsum pa'i bgrod pa lnga pa la
T02D1347-1:253b-42: g-yas pa'i rtsa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gnyis rgyu'o
T02D1347-1:254a-1: bgrod pa drug pa la mi rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:254a-2: de nas bgrod pa bdun pa la g-yon pa'i rtsa'i nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dbugs gsum rgyu'o //
T02D1347-1:254a-3: brgyad pa la ma yin no //

T02D1347-1:262a-27: rab gsal mtshams su ste dus sbyor gnyis ka'i dbus

T02D1347-1:262a-32: pa'i drug brgyar gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus

T02D1347-1:262a-37: phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang nas rtsa zung
T02D1347-1:262a-38: zhig 'joms shing dkyil 'khor lnga rlung yang dag par

T02D1347-1:265a-11: gnyis pa la ga gam kha kham /

T02D1347-1:265a-13: bzhi pa la dzha dzham dza dzam /
T02D1347-1:265a-14: de nas mgrin pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams su lnga pa la tsha tsham tsa tsam /
T02D1347-1:265a-15: drug pa la na nam dha dham /
T02D1347-1:265a-16: bdun pa la da dam tha tham /
T02D1347-1:265a-17: brgyad pa la ta tam ma mam /
T02D1347-1:265a-18: dgu pa la bha bham ba bam /
T02D1347-1:265a-19: bcu pa la pha pham pa pam /
T02D1347-1:265a-20: bcu gcig pa la na nam dha dham /
T02D1347-1:265a-21: bcu gnyis pa la da dam tha tham /
T02D1347-1:265a-22: snying kha'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams su bcu gsum pa la ta tam tkha tkham /
T02D1347-1:265a-23: bcu bzhi pa la sha sham sha sham zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-1:265a-24: de nas gnam stong la lte ba dang ge sar gyi rtse mor wa wam sa sam /
T02D1347-1:265a-25: snying kha'i lte ba dang ge sar gyi rtse mor
T02D1347-1:265a-26: gnam stong gi mthar gzhom du med pa ste thig
T02D1347-1:265a-27: le stong pa yi ge drug ces pa dang stong
T02D1347-1:265a-28: pa chen po yi ge lnga zhes pa ste zla
T02D1347-1:265a-29: ba dang nyi ma'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:265a-30: da ni phyogs la zla ba zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:265a-31: pas zla ba dang nyi ma'i nor dang bu lon
T02D1347-1:265a-32: gsungs te / 'dir tshes kyi nges pa la nyin
T02D1347-1:265a-33: zhag so sor sbyin dang dor dang slar yang sbyin
T02D1347-1:265a-34: zhes pa gsungs pa'i phyir gza'i gnas su chu tshod
T02D1347-1:265a-35: drug cu bdag nyid kyi cha sbyin no //
T02D1347-1:265a-36: de'i bu lon gyi rgyur chu tshod kyi gnas su chu tshod kyis dman pa'o //
T02D1347-1:265a-37: de'i phyir rags pa'i tshad kyis nyin zhag so sor
T02D1347-1:265a-38: chu tshod gcig gis dman pa'i cha dang phra mo'i
T02D1347-1:265a-39: tshad kyis rkang pa dang bcas pa'i chu srang lnga
T02D1347-1:265a-42: gang gi phyir nyin zhag gi tshogs la drug cu
T02D1347-1:265a-43: rtsa bzhi'i chas thob pa bu lon du 'gyur ba
T02D1347-1:265a-44: de'i phyir nyin zhag so sor rkang pa dang bcas
T02D1347-1:265a-45: pa'i chu srang lnga bcu rtsa drug ste nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:265a-46: drug cu rtsa bzhis nyin zhag gcig dman pa ni
T02D1347-1:265a-47: cha zad pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:265a-48: nyi ma'i nyin zhag gnyis so //
T02D1347-1:265a-49: de ltar phyogs la zla ba rang gi rgyu bas
T02D1347-1:265b-0: nyin zhag @265b ces bya'i rkang pa dag kyang bu
T02D1347-1:265b-2: chu tshod bco lnga zhes bya ste rkang pa zhes pa ni tshes kyi bzhi cha zhes bya'o //
T02D1347-1:265b-3: kyang yig las rkang pa dang bcas pa'i chu srang lnga bcu rtsa drug gis dman pa'o //
T02D1347-1:265b-4: slar yang ste yang nyin zhag so sor nyams pa
T02D1347-1:265b-5: zla ba gnyis kyis te nyin zhag drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-1:265b-6: bzhis gzhan pa dag kyang nyin zhag bu lon du
T02D1347-1:265b-7: 'gyur ro // slar yang lo yi sbyor ba dag
T02D1347-1:265b-8: las 'phel ba ni rdzogs pa'i lo la nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:265b-9: drug tu 'gyur te sngar brjod pa'i cho gas dman
T02D1347-1:265b-10: 'gyur ro // pa'o // gzhan yang de bzhin 'chi
T02D1347-1:265b-11: bdag gis mtshams su 'phel 'chi ba'i mtshams ni lo
T02D1347-1:265b-12: brgya ste 'chi ba'i mtshams de las bu lon nyin
T02D1347-1:265b-13: zhag gi tshogs phyed dang bcas pa'i drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-1:265b-14: gnyis lhag pa'i lnga brgya 'phel lo //
T02D1347-1:265b-15: rgyal po de ltar nyi ma'i nyis 'gyur 'di ni
T02D1347-1:265b-16: lo'i dbang gis 'chi ba'i mtshams su 'phel te nyin
T02D1347-1:265b-17: zhag gi tshogs nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya
T02D1347-1:265b-18: phrag bcu gcig 'chi ba'i mtshams su 'phel lo //
T02D1347-1:265b-20: da ni dbugs drug ces pa la sogs pas dbugs la sogs pa'i dbye bas lo'i grangs gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:265b-21: 'dir mi rnams kyi lus la dbugs 'jug pa dang
T02D1347-1:265b-22: 'byung ba drug gis chu srang gcig tu 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:265b-23: de yang chu srang du brjod do //
T02D1347-1:265b-24: chu srang de drug cus chu tshod gcig tu 'gyur te dbyug gu gcig gi bdag nyid can no //
T02D1347-1:265b-25: chu tshod de dag drug cu ni nyin zhag ste nyin mtshan du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:265b-26: gsum gyis bsgyur ba bcu ste sum cu'i nyin zhag de dag gis zla ba gcig go //
T02D1347-1:265b-27: chu srin la sogs pa'i zla ba de dag drug gis bgrod pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:265b-28: bgrod pa de nyid gnyis kyis bsgyur ba ni lo gcig tu rab tu grags so //
T02D1347-1:265b-29: skyes bu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya po 'di las
T02D1347-1:265b-30: bu lon bgrod par son pa ni mun pa'i rtsa'i
T02D1347-1:265b-32: dus ni 'chi ba ste de'i rtsa yi dbang gis
T02D1347-1:265b-33: ni aa ba dh'u t'i'i grangs kyi chos kyis so
T02D1347-1:265b-34: zhes pa ste dus kyi rtsa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:265b-35: da ni 'jig rten gsum na zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:265b-36: pas dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams dman pa nyid
T02D1347-1:265b-37: du gsungs te / 'dir 'jig rten gsum na lha
T02D1347-1:265b-38: dang lag 'gro mi rnams kyi nang na gang zhig
T02D1347-1:265b-39: rang gi lus la zla ba nyi ma dag rdzogs
T02D1347-1:266a-2: de rgyu gang las zhe na gang gi phyir zla
T02D1347-1:266a-3: bas rang gi rgyu bas lo'i mtshams su nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:266a-4: gi tshogs sum brgya drug cu rgyu ba ma yin
T02D1347-1:266a-5: zhing / srid par te lus la lo yi nang
T02D1347-1:266a-6: du rim pas te sngar brjod pa'i cho ga dag
T02D1347-1:266a-7: gis nyi mas kyang ni rgyu skar thams cad de
T02D1347-1:266a-8: nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyu ba min pa de'i phyir
T02D1347-1:266a-9: zhing / ro // lo so so nas lo so
T02D1347-1:266a-10: sor bu lon dag gis de ni srid pa ste
T02D1347-1:266a-11: zhing / ro // lus za'o // dus kyi 'khor
T02D1347-1:266a-12: lo dpa' bo gcig pu skye ba dang 'jig pa'i
T02D1347-1:266a-13: rgyur gyur pa ste 'khor ba pa rnams la dus
T02D1347-1:266a-14: kyi 'khor lo dpa' bo gcig bu'o //
T02D1347-1:266a-15: de'i phyir rnal 'byor las zla ba dang nyi ma dag rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1347-1:266a-17: rdul gyi sems kyi chos srog dang thur sel dag
T02D1347-1:266a-18: rdzogs par byas nas de bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1347-1:266a-19: ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:266a-20: da ni 'chad pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'chi
T02D1347-1:266a-21: ltas kyi dbang gis gci ba la sogs pa'i khams
T02D1347-1:266a-22: kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:266a-23: 'dir lus la 'chad pa gal te g-yon pa'am g-yas
T02D1347-1:266a-24: pa'i rtsa gcig srog rab tu 'bab pa dang bral
T02D1347-1:266a-25: ba yin na mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni
T02D1347-1:266a-26: bod pa ste zla ba drug gi mtshams su gci
T02D1347-1:266a-27: ba dag ni skyur ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:266a-28: de tsam rnams ni nyin zhag lnga nas mchog gi
T02D1347-1:266a-29: rtsa srog gi nus pa chen po yis 'dor te
T02D1347-1:266a-30: rim pa bzhin nyin zhag so sor gong bu 'chad
T02D1347-1:266a-31: pa'i dus su'o // nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su
T02D1347-1:266a-32: yul sgra rna ba la 'dor te rna ba la
T02D1347-1:266a-33: zhes pa ni lung gi tshig las lnga pa'i don
T02D1347-1:266a-34: pa'i dus su'o // la bdun pa'o // nyin zhag
T02D1347-1:266a-35: lnga'i mtshams su ro yang nges par kha las te
T02D1347-1:266a-37: nyin zhag bzhi'i mtshams su mig 'bras mig gi dbus nas so //
T02D1347-1:266a-38: nyin zhag gsum gyi mtshams su dri ni sna las so //
T02D1347-1:266a-39: nyin zhag gnyis kyi mtshams su mi rnams dag gi
T02D1347-1:266a-40: lag pa rkang pa'i lus las dro ba'i dngos po
T02D1347-1:266a-41: ste reg pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:266a-42: mtha'i nyin zhag la chos kyi dbyings khu ba 'pho ba dang dbugs kyi 'khor lo yang 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:266a-43: nyin zhag drug gi nang du 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gzhan yang gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:266a-44: 'dir lus la 'chi bar rab tu zhugs par gyur
T02D1347-1:266b-0: na @266b rang gi lus sna yi rtse mo 'phyang
T02D1347-1:266b-1: ba glang po che'i sna'i rnam par mthong ba dang
T02D1347-1:266b-2: / rang gi spyi bor lag pa bzhag pa de
T02D1347-1:266b-3: yi rang bzhin dag tu mthong ste phra mor mthong
T02D1347-1:266b-5: de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil la rgya
T02D1347-1:266b-6: skyegs tshon gyis rab tu byugs kyang lag mthil gyi
T02D1347-1:266b-7: pags pa la dmar po nyid du byed pa ma
T02D1347-1:266b-8: yin pa dang nyi ma kha dog nag por mthong
T02D1347-1:266b-9: ba dang yongs su gyur pa'i ri bong 'dzin pa
T02D1347-1:266b-10: ste nya'i zla ba yongs su rdzogs par ser por
T02D1347-1:266b-11: mthong ba ni nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su'o //
T02D1347-1:266b-12: de nas nyin zhag gang la gcin dang lus kyang
T02D1347-1:266b-13: bsil bar gyur pa'i nyin zhag de la 'chi ba
T02D1347-1:266b-14: nyid de mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod
T02D1347-1:266b-15: pa'o // nyin zhag drug gi mtshams su 'chi ba'i mtshan ma gzhan yang gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:266b-16: 'dir dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas non pa'i lce
T02D1347-1:266b-17: 'og tu nag po'i thig ste ri mo rnams nag
T02D1347-1:266b-19: de bzhin du mig la tshangs pa'i ri mo shin
T02D1347-1:266b-20: tu phra mo skra'i tshad tsam gyi ri mo ste
T02D1347-1:266b-21: nag po dang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor 'byed par byed
T02D1347-1:266b-22: par 'gyur ro // dbugs ni zla ba nyi ma'i
T02D1347-1:266b-23: lam du 'phro bar mkhur [?] chos gnyis po bskyod
T02D1347-1:266b-24: par 'gyur ro // pa dang / de bzhin du
T02D1347-1:266b-25: nu ma'i steng ni mchan khung du zhugs te nu
T02D1347-1:266b-26: ma'i steng gi rtsa dag mchan khung du zhugs par
T02D1347-1:266b-27: par 'gyur ro // pa dang / gyur pa dang
T02D1347-1:266b-28: / gza'i tshogs rnams mtha' dag mi mthong ste me
T02D1347-1:266b-29: stag dang bcas par mthong ba dang de'i mgrin pa
T02D1347-1:266b-31: lag pa dang rkang pa dang bcas pa rengs shing
T02D1347-1:266b-32: sems med pa dang 'khor ba yang ste 'di dag
T02D1347-1:266b-33: ni lus la 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur bar
T02D1347-1:266b-35: gzhan yang lus sam phyi rol la grib ma'i skyes
T02D1347-1:266b-36: bu la sogs pa gang cung zad phyin ci log
T02D1347-1:266b-37: tu mthong ba de thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1347-1:266b-38: du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:266b-39: de shes nas sbyin pa la sogs pa bya ste
T02D1347-1:266b-40: gal te bsod nams kyi stobs kyis 'tsho ba de
T02D1347-1:266b-42: ci ste 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta na yang
T02D1347-1:266b-43: gang byin pa de'i 'bras bu rjes su spyod do
T02D1347-1:266b-44: // de'i phyir phyogs gnyis ka la yang bde bar
T02D1347-1:266b-45: gshegs pa pa bde ba don du gnyer ba rnams
T02D1347-1:267a-0: kyis sbyin par byin par bya'o zhes pa @267a *
T02D1347-1:267a-1: // // ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267a-2: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-1:267a-3: 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-1:267a-4: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-1:267a-5: las 'chi ltas kyi 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid dang rtsa
T02D1347-1:267a-6: 'chad pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste bzhi pa'o /
T02D1347-1:267a-8: // / da ni skye ba dang ni zhes pa la
T02D1347-1:267a-9: sogs pas 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis skyed pa
T02D1347-1:267a-10: dang sdud pa'i mtshan nyid byed pa po gsungs te
T02D1347-1:267a-11: / 'khor ba 'dir 'pho ba'i skad cig gang yin
T02D1347-1:267a-12: pa des sems can rnams kyi skye ba byed de
T02D1347-1:267a-13: mngal du kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa rdul dang
T02D1347-1:267a-14: khu ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i chos can
T02D1347-1:267a-15: / no // de nas des mngal nas btsa' ba'i
T02D1347-1:267a-16: dus byed cing byis pa dang gzhon nu la sogs
T02D1347-1:267a-17: pa'i gzugs byed de lus skyed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267a-18: 'pho ba'i skad cig de nyid 'jig rten dag tu
T02D1347-1:267a-19: ste mtho ris dang mi yul dang sa 'og tu
T02D1347-1:267a-20: slar yang sdud par byed pa dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-1:267a-22: nyi ma rdul dang zla ba khu ba dus kyi 'khor lo med pa ste /
T02D1347-1:267a-23: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa med pas mi byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:267a-24: 'dir rdul dang khu ba'i chos can nyi ma dang zla bas ci'i phyir mi byed ce na /
T02D1347-1:267a-25: 'dir thams cad du me dang nyi ma dang zla
T02D1347-1:267a-26: ba'i bdag nyid ni 'gro ba'o zhes pa rab tu
T02D1347-1:267a-27: grags pa'i tshig gi phyir gsungs so //
T02D1347-1:267a-28: 'dir gang gi phyir zla ba nyi ma la sogs
T02D1347-1:267a-29: lha rnams 'byung ba dang bcas mtshan mo'i chal bcom
T02D1347-1:267a-30: ldan de yis zos zhes pa ste 'khor ba 'dir
T02D1347-1:267a-31: mtshan mo'i cha ni zla ba ste skyed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267a-32: nyin mo'i cha ni nyi ma ste sdud pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267a-33: 'dir mtshan mo'i cha la ste skyed pa'i dus su
T02D1347-1:267a-34: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid nges pa'i
T02D1347-1:267a-35: mngal du zla ba khu ba dang nyi ma rdul
T02D1347-1:267a-36: dang sogs pa'i sgras bshad pa dang gci ba dang
T02D1347-1:267a-37: 'byung ba dang bcas sa dang chu dang me dang
T02D1347-1:267a-38: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang bcas pa rnams rdul
T02D1347-1:267a-39: dang khu ba'i rten du gnas pa'i lus dang ngag
T02D1347-1:267a-40: dang sems rdzogs pa'i don du zos te /
T02D1347-1:267a-41: zla ba ste khu ba ni dbang phyug go //
T02D1347-1:267a-42: nyi ma ste rdul ni rtag tu bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267b-0: zla ba nyi ma la sogs lha rnams mtshan mo'i chal ste skyed @267b pa'i dus su zos so //
T02D1347-1:267b-1: slar yang ste yang mtha' yas lus la dngos po
T02D1347-1:267b-2: sna tshogs kyis bzung bar gyur pa ni rnam par
T02D1347-1:267b-3: 'phrul pa ste de dag rnams gtong bar byed de
T02D1347-1:267b-4: nges par nyin mo'i dus su zhes pa sdud pa'i
T02D1347-1:267b-5: dus su gtong zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-1:267b-6: skyed pa'i rgyur ni ste slar yang gzhan skyed pa'i rgyu ru gtong bar byed do //
T02D1347-1:267b-7: rim pas te lte ba dang snying kha dang mgrin
T02D1347-1:267b-8: pa dang dpral ba dang gtsug tor gyi gnas rnams
T02D1347-1:267b-9: su sa la sogs pa'i khams yongs su gtong ba'i
T02D1347-1:267b-10: rim pas so // kun rdzob kyi byed pa po'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267b-11: da ni sgra la sogs pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-1:267b-12: pas 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi las dang byed pa
T02D1347-1:267b-14: 'dir lus grub par gyur pa na sgra dang reg
T02D1347-1:267b-15: bya dang gzugs dang ro dang dri dang chos kyi
T02D1347-1:267b-16: dbyings te drug po rnams ni las su 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:267b-17: // dbang po drug po dag kyang ste rna ba
T02D1347-1:267b-18: dang lus dang mig dang lce dang sna dang yid
T02D1347-1:267b-19: [?] de drug po ni byed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267b-20: khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbye bas lo dang zla ba
T02D1347-1:267b-21: dang zla ba'i tsha'i dbye bas phyogs nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-1:267b-22: bzhi dang nyin dang mtshan mo ste nyin mtshan dang
T02D1347-1:267b-23: tshes bco lnga dang zla ba dang nyi ma dag
T02D1347-1:267b-24: kyang ste 'di dag mtha' dag ni byed pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267b-25: byed pa po ni kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i
T02D1347-1:267b-26: mtshan nyid khu ba 'pho ba'i skad cig lhan cig
T02D1347-1:267b-27: skyes pa'i dga' ba ste 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis
T02D1347-1:267b-28: so // 'pho ba'i skad cig la sogs pa byed
T02D1347-1:267b-29: pa po dang byed pa dang las 'di dag sdud
T02D1347-1:267b-30: pa'i byed pa po gzhan du 'dir 'gyur te gang
T02D1347-1:267b-31: gi phyir skyed pa'i byed pa po ni byed pa
T02D1347-1:267b-33: de'i phyir mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje can te
T02D1347-1:267b-34: yul dang rnam bral yon tan med la rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:267b-35: med pa'o zhes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste
T02D1347-1:267b-36: cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po zhes pa'o de'i
T02D1347-1:267b-37: phyir skyed pa dang sdud pa'i byed pa po dang
T02D1347-1:267b-38: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med do
T02D1347-1:267b-40: byed pa po zad pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:267b-41: da ni dri dang zhes pa la sogs pas tshogs pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:267b-42: 'khor ba 'dir tshogs pa las skye ba ste chos gcig las ni ma yin no //
T02D1347-1:267b-43: 'dir tshogs pa ni dri dang kha dog dang ni
T02D1347-1:267b-44: ro dang reg pa zhes dang 'dzin ma dang ni

T02D1347-1:274a-20: 'dod pa'i lha la bstod pa'i dus su grangs bzhin
T02D1347-1:274a-21: du sangs rgyas pa rnams la rdo rje'i gdan bsngags
T02D1347-1:274a-22: shing kla klo rnams la lha min gyi gdan bsngags
T02D1347-1:274a-23: so // yang yig las gzhan ni thun mong ba ste de ni mi sgrub cing mi 'gog go //
T02D1347-1:274a-24: 'dir lha min gyi gdan ni sa'i ngos la pus
T02D1347-1:274a-25: mo g-yon gyi steng du pus mo g-yas brkyang zhing
T02D1347-1:274a-26: rkang pa g-yon gyi steng du rkang pa g-yas pa'o
T02D1347-1:274a-27: // yang yig las 'og tu ste rkang pa g-yas pa'i steng du'o //
T02D1347-1:274a-28: rkang pa'i mthil du yang yang yig las rgyab tu [?] dpyi bzhag pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274a-29: rdo rje'i gdan la sogs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:274a-30: sangs rgyas pa dang lha min gyi bya ba nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274a-31: 'byung po rnams kyi las 'dren mar sngar gsungs pa
T02D1347-1:274a-32: de yang 'dir tshigs su bcad pas gsal par gsungs
T02D1347-1:274a-34: 'byung po rnams kyi las ni 'dren mar rab tu
T02D1347-1:274a-35: 'gyur te tshig kyang 'dres pa sha za dag gi'o
T02D1347-1:274a-36: // chos ni 'tshe med 'tshe ldan bla ma'i nges
T02D1347-1:274a-37: pa'i dbang gi srog gcod la sogs skyon dag la
T02D1347-1:274a-38: // // mchod sbyin la sogs don du rab tu
T02D1347-1:274a-39: 'jug sogs pa'i sgras g-yul gyi don du 'tsho [?]
T02D1347-1:274b-1: dka' thub kyi 'bras bu'i don du ldog pa ste /
T02D1347-1:274b-2: mi 'tshe ba la rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te
T02D1347-1:274b-3: mi yi bdag po res 'ga' dag ni ldog pa
T02D1347-1:274b-4: 'am zhes pa'o // bza' ba btung ba dag kyang
T02D1347-1:274b-5: 'dres pa nyi zla'i bgrod pa dag las lam ni
T02D1347-1:274b-6: 'dren ma gzhan du'o zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-1:274b-7: 'byung po rnams kyi lam ni thams cad kun du 'dres par rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-1:274b-8: 'byung po rnams kyi bya ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274b-9: da ni 'od zer zhes pa la sogs pas lam brjod par 'dod pa gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:274b-10: 'dir lam ni rnam pa gsum ste 'od zer gyi
T02D1347-1:274b-11: lam dang du ba'i lam dang rnam par 'dres pa'i
T02D1347-1:274b-12: lam mo // 'di dag las 'od zer lam ni
T02D1347-1:274b-13: nyi ma'i snang ba dkar po nyin mo bgrod pa
T02D1347-1:274b-14: byang ste nyin mo 'phel ba'i mtshan nyid dang lo
T02D1347-1:274b-15: phyed ni phyi rol du ste /
T02D1347-1:274b-16: nang du chu srin la sogs pa dus sbyor drug gi bdag nyid can te /
T02D1347-1:274b-17: shar ba nas nub pa zhes bya ba'i ming can no //
T02D1347-1:274b-18: du ba'i lam ni zla ba'i snang ba mtshan mo
T02D1347-1:274b-19: dag dang dkar min bgrod pa 'di ni lho ste
T02D1347-1:274b-20: / du ba'i lam dag la ka rka ta la sogs pa lhor bgrod pa'i zla ba drug ste /
T02D1347-1:274b-21: gang du mtshan mo 'phel ba de lhor bgrod pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274b-22: nub par gyur pa nas shar ba'i bar ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274b-23: 'dir 'od zer lha rnams mtho ris su ste mtsho ris su 'gro ba'i lam mo //
T02D1347-1:274b-24: dkar min bgrod pa lha min rnams kyi klu'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i du ba'i lam mo //
T02D1347-1:274b-25: kun du 'dres pa nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i chos
T02D1347-1:274b-26: can ni mi yi 'jig rten du 'gro ba la
T02D1347-1:274b-27: ste / yi dags dang dud 'gro dang mi rnams
T02D1347-1:274b-28: bskyed pa la rab tu gsal bar byas so zhes
T02D1347-1:274b-29: pa ni lam gyi nges pa ste /
T02D1347-1:274b-30: skye ba snga ma'i bag chags kyis bskyed pa'i snying
T02D1347-1:274b-31: stobs dang mun pa dang rdul gyi yon tan gyi
T02D1347-1:274b-33: da ni gang zhig gang gi dbus su zhes pa
T02D1347-1:274b-34: la sogs pas sangs rgyas pa'i nyan thos dang lha
T02D1347-1:274b-35: min dang 'byung po'i las la dga' ba'i sems can
T02D1347-1:274b-36: rnams kyi bag chags 'dzin pa gsungs te /
T02D1347-1:274b-37: 'khor ba 'dir skye ba'i las kyi bag chags kyi
T02D1347-1:274b-38: stobs kyis lha dang lha min dang 'byung po'i bya
T02D1347-1:274b-39: ba la rjes su chags pa gang zhig gang gi
T02D1347-1:274b-40: dbus su rab tu zhugs par gyur te /
T02D1347-1:274b-41: brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' las kyi zhags pas des bcings pa //
T02D1347-1:274b-42: zhes pa chos de'i bya ba rnams kyis bcings pa'o //
T02D1347-1:274b-43: de yi dbus su dang rang bsam pas mi bdag ni bod pa ste /
T02D1347-1:275a-1: te lha dang lha min dang 'byung po'i rigs su
T02D1347-1:275a-2: de'i 'dzin pa dag gis zhes pa ni de'i dngos
T02D1347-1:275a-4: de yis lha dang lha min dang 'byung po'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:275a-5: snying stobs dang mun pa dang rdul gyi ngar 'dzin gyis te sngar brjod pa'i cho gas so //
T02D1347-1:275a-6: ji srid sems kyi rang bzhin dag ni rnam gsum
T02D1347-1:275a-7: srid pa'i dbang gis zhes pa ni 'dod pa dang
T02D1347-1:275a-8: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i bag chags kyi
T02D1347-1:275a-9: dbang gis te / tshor ba bde ba dang sdug
T02D1347-1:275a-10: bsngal 'khor ba par gyur pa de srid du 'khor
T02D1347-1:275a-11: ba sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid du sems kyang 'khyam
T02D1347-1:275a-12: dbang gis te / ste / mi yi bdag po
T02D1347-1:275a-13: mtho ris mi yul dag dang 'og tu yang zhes

T02D1347-1:275a-15: 'gro ba drug po rnams su kun gzhi'i rnam par
T02D1347-1:275a-16: shes pa 'khyam mo zhes pa ste bag chags 'dzin
T02D1347-1:275a-17: dbang gis te / ste / pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:275a-18: de'i phyir bag chags rnam par gsum las 'das pa
T02D1347-1:275a-19: ni 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa /
T02D1347-1:275a-20: bya ba byas pa skam [?] sar gnas pa /
T02D1347-1:275a-21: ye shes kyi sku bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
T02D1347-1:275a-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang lha ma yin dang
T02D1347-1:275a-23: klu la sogs pa rnams kyis zhabs kyi padma la
T02D1347-1:275a-24: phyag byas pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o zhes pa ni
T02D1347-1:275a-25: bag chags spangs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-1:275a-26: da ni ka sogs zhes pa la sogs pas mngal
T02D1347-1:275a-27: du gsal byed dang dbyangs kyang skye bar 'gyur ba
T02D1347-1:275a-28: ji lta ba de bzhin du 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D1347-1:275a-29: gsungs te / 'dir mngal 'dzin pa'i dus su rdul
T02D1347-1:275a-30: ni gsal byed sum cu'i bdag nyid dang khu ba
T02D1347-1:275a-31: ni dbyangs sum cu'i bdag nyid de 'di dag kun
T02D1347-1:275a-32: gzhi'i rnam par shes pas byin gyis brlabs pa ni
T02D1347-1:275a-34: /'dir mngal du skye ba'i phyogs dang po la ka
T02D1347-1:275a-35: yig la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum cu po rnams
T02D1347-1:275a-36: dbyangs thung [?] ngus byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1347-1:275a-37: phyogs phyi ma la dbyangs ring pos byin gyis brlabs
T02D1347-1:275a-38: pa ste gsal byed kyi phyogs gnyis po 'di ni
T02D1347-1:275a-39: 'chi ba la rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:275a-40: de bzhin du dkar po'i phyogs la khu ba'i nam mkha'i khams rdul la rab tu 'jug ste /
T02D1347-1:275a-41: nag po'i phyogs la sa'i khams rab tu 'jug go //
T02D1347-1:275a-42: de bzhin du 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba dag
T02D1347-1:275a-43: la rdul gyi sa dang nam mkha'i khams dag khu
T02D1347-1:275a-44: ba'i khams la rab tu 'jug go //
T02D1347-1:275b-0: de bzhin du zla ba gnyis pa'i phyogs @275b dang
T02D1347-1:275b-1: po la ai yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsal
T02D1347-1:275b-2: byed rnams te rdul rlung gi khams rab tu 'jug
T02D1347-1:275b-3: go // phyogs phyi ma la au yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams te chu'i khams 'jug go //
T02D1347-1:275b-4: gsum pa'i phyogs dang po la me'i khams 'jug pa'i
T02D1347-1:275b-5: slad du ri yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams
T02D1347-1:275b-6: so // phyogs phyi ma la me'i khams 'jug pa'i
T02D1347-1:275b-7: slad du r'i yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams
T02D1347-1:275b-8: so // so // zla ba bzhi pa'i phyogs dang
T02D1347-1:275b-9: po la chu'i khams 'jug pa'i slad du au yig
T02D1347-1:275b-10: gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams so //
