T02D1347-1:275b-12: du a'i yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams so
T02D1347-1:275b-13: // zla ba lnga pa'i phyogs dang po la sa'i
T02D1347-1:275b-14: khams 'jug pa'i slad du li yig gis byin gyis
T02D1347-1:275b-16: phyogs phyi ma la nam mkha'i khams 'jug pa'i slad
T02D1347-1:275b-17: du a'a yig ring pos byin gyis brlabs pa rnams
T02D1347-1:275b-18: te / skyed pa dang sdud pa'i dbye bas nam

T02D1347-1:275b-22: gyis brlabs pa'i slad du yon tan dang 'phel ba
T02D1347-1:275b-23: dang ha la sogs pa thung ngu dang ring po

T02D1347-1:275b-25: / zla ba drug pa'i phyogs dang po'i phyed la aa /
T02D1347-1:275b-26: phyogs dang po'i phyed phyi ma la ha /
T02D1347-1:275b-27: phyogs phyi ma'i phyed la a'a la /
T02D1347-1:275b-28: phyogs phyi ma'i phyed phyi ma la l'a /
T02D1347-1:275b-29: de bzhin du bdun pa la ae ya aoo w'a //
T02D1347-1:275b-30: brgyad pa la aa ra ra a'a ra r'a /
T02D1347-1:275b-31: dgu pa la ao wa aee y'a /

T02D1347-1:275b-33: mngal gyi zla ba'i rjes la zla ba bcus phun

T02D1347-1:275b-35: 'grub bo // khu ba dang rdul yang dag par
T02D1347-1:275b-36: sbyor bas phung po dang khams dang skye mched la
T02D1347-1:275b-37: sogs pa rnams spro ste skyed pa dang sdud pa'i
T02D1347-1:275b-38: 'grub bo // rim pas so // de bzhin du
T02D1347-1:275b-39: zla ba bcu gcig pa la thig les byin gyis

T02D1347-1:275b-45: kyi lo bcu drug la nyi ma rdul 'phel bar
T02D1347-1:276a-0: byed do // de nas ye shes @276a * //

T02D1347-1:276a-3: de nas snga ma bzhin du shes rab kyi gzhan
T02D1347-1:276a-4: lo bcu gnyis dang thabs kyi gzhan lo bcu drug
T02D1347-1:276a-6: mtshams 'di nas snying stobs kyi chad bu mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:276a-7: slar yang shes rab kyi gzhan lo bco brgyad du chu'i khams smin te /
T02D1347-1:276a-8: thabs kyi phyed dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1347-1:276a-9: zla ba gcig lhag pa'i lo bcu drug tu snga ma bzhin du chu'i khams smin no //
T02D1347-1:276a-10: shes rab kyi me smin pa ni snga ma bzhin te thabs kyi yang snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1347-1:276a-11: de bzhin du rlung gi khams smin pa dang nam
T02D1347-1:276a-12: mkha'i khams smin pa ste snying stobs dang rdul dang
T02D1347-1:276a-13: mun pa'i dbye bas lo dgu bcu rtsa drug dang
T02D1347-1:276a-14: phyed dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcus khams thams cad
T02D1347-1:276a-15: smin no // de nas dbu ma'i rtsa lo dang
T02D1347-1:276a-16: phyogs dang nyin zhag gi tshad gsal byed sum cu'i
T02D1347-1:276a-17: [?] tshad de nyin zhag tshogs lnga bcu rtsa lnga

T02D1347-1:276a-19: rgyu ste za bar byed do //

T02D1347-1:276a-22: stong brgyad cur gyur pa dang gang yang phyogs gsum
T02D1347-1:276a-23: dag gi dbyangs thung ngu dang ring po dang shin
T02D1347-1:276a-24: tu ring po bzhi bcu rtsa lnga dang /

T02D1347-1:276a-27: g-yas dang dbu ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi ba

T02D1347-1:276a-30: brgya phrag bcu gcig sngar brjod pa rnams dang nyi

T02D1347-1:276a-38: zhag so sor chu tshod gnyis kyi bdag nyid de
T02D1347-1:276a-39: rkang pa chu tshod kyi bdag nyid 'di dag ni
T02D1347-1:276a-40: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum dang gsal byed sum cu'i
T02D1347-1:276a-41: nyin zhag gi grangs te 'di dag nyid la 'chi
T02D1347-1:276a-42: do // brgyu'o // de bzhin du sum cu rtsa
T02D1347-1:276a-43: gnyis lo dang phyogs kyang yon tan gyis bsgyur ba
T02D1347-1:276a-44: zla ba nyi ma me yis phye ba'i zhes pa
T02D1347-1:276a-45: ni snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pas phye ba
T02D1347-1:276b-0: ste lo dgu @276b bcu rtsa drug dang gzhan phyed
T02D1347-1:276b-1: dang bcas pa'i zla ba bcu'i phyogs rnams so //
T02D1347-1:276b-2: g-yon dang g-yas kyi rtsa'i phyogs lo brgya'i phyogs rnams
T02D1347-1:276b-3: kyi nang nas lo gsum gyi ni phyogs rnams dag
T02D1347-1:276b-4: ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1347-1:276b-5: ri bong can gyi yon tan de phyogs gsum dang dus kyi me yi phyogs gnyis dag ste /
T02D1347-1:276b-6: de ltar phyogs bdun cu rtsa bdun lo brgya las
T02D1347-1:276b-7: ni ste lo brgya'i phyogs kyi phung po brgya phrag

T02D1347-1:276b-10: 'jig rten mig dang me mig grags zhes pa nyi
T02D1347-1:276b-11: shu rtsa gsum lhag pa'i brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-1:276b-12: gsum mo // de bzhin du nyin mtshan dus rnams
T02D1347-1:276b-13: gtso bo dag gis dman pa mtha' dad ste lo
T02D1347-1:276b-14: brgya'i stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02D1347-1:276b-15: gtso bos dman pa ni lo gsum dang phyogs gsum
T02D1347-1:276b-16: dang gsal byed kyi zla bas dman pa ste g-yon
T02D1347-1:276b-17: dang g-yas la 'chi bas zos pa'o //
T02D1347-1:276b-18: gsal byed la sogs sde pa dbyangs rnams dag ni
T02D1347-1:276b-19: nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'chi bas
T02D1347-1:276b-20: zos te / 'chi ltas nas brtsams nas dbu ma'i dus su zos so //

T02D1347-1:276b-22: bcas 'khor lo ni khyim bco brgyad kyi grangs te
T02D1347-1:276b-23: sum cu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgyas bsgyur ba sum
T02D1347-1:276b-24: cu lhag pa'i brgya phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni

T02D1347-1:276b-32: nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi grangs so //
T02D1347-1:276b-33: shes rab thabs kyi rab tu dbye ba dag gis
T02D1347-1:276b-34: te sdud pa dang skyed pa'i dbye bas nyin mtshan

T02D1347-1:276b-44: ba'i 'chi ba la ste sngar brjod pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-1:276b-45: // de nas sum cu gnyis dang nyin zhag gcig
T02D1347-1:277a-0: kyang zhes pa nyin zhag sum cu rtsa @277a *
T02D1347-1:277a-2: ri bong can bcas nyi ma'i bgrod la ste g-yon
T02D1347-1:277a-3: pa'i bgrod pa dang bcas pa'i g-yas pa'i bgrod pa
T02D1347-1:277a-4: las rtsa ni gcod pa 'di thun mong ba'o //
T02D1347-1:277a-5: dus kyi 'chi ba la ni slar yang ste sum
T02D1347-1:277a-6: cu mtshan mo gsum gyis zhes pa nyin zhag sum
T02D1347-1:277a-7: cu rtsa gsum gyis rdo rje dang bcas te lus
T02D1347-1:277a-8: dang ngag dang sems dang bcas pa'i phung po khams
T02D1347-1:277a-9: dang dbang po la sogs 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-10: de nas dor nas zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa la
T02D1347-1:277a-11: la n'a dang ra sa n'a dag dang dung can
T02D1347-1:277a-12: ma aa ba dh'u t'ir srog gi rlung dag nyin
T02D1347-1:277a-13: gcig rab 'jug ste sa dang chu dang bsreg za
T02D1347-1:277a-14: rlung dang nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par chad pa
T02D1347-1:277a-16: 'dir 'chi ba'i nyin zhag la dbu mar srog rab
T02D1347-1:277a-17: tu zhugs te dus kyi rlung gis dman par gyur
T02D1347-1:277a-18: pa na lte bar sa'i khams yon tan lnga'i rang
T02D1347-1:277a-19: bzhin 'dor te de nas sa'i khams rnam par chad
T02D1347-1:277a-20: par 'gyur ro // snying gar chu'i khams yon tan
T02D1347-1:277a-21: bzhi'i rang bzhin 'dor te chu'i khams rnam par chad
T02D1347-1:277a-22: par 'gyur ro // par 'gyur ro // mgrin par
T02D1347-1:277a-23: me'i khams yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin 'dor te
T02D1347-1:277a-24: de nas ma'i khams rnam par chad par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-1:277a-26: bar rlung gi khams yon tan gnyis kyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-1:277a-27: 'dor te de nas rlung gi khams rnam par chad
T02D1347-1:277a-29: 'gyur ro // gtsug tor du nam mkha'i khams yon
T02D1347-1:277a-30: tan gcig gi rang bzhin 'dor te de nas stong
T02D1347-1:277a-31: pa'i khams rnam par 'chad do zhes pa ni steng
T02D1347-1:277a-32: du srog gi khams yongs su 'dor pa'o //
T02D1347-1:277a-33: 'og tu lte bar lus kyi thig le'i chos thur sel 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-34: de nas sad pa'i gnas skabs zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-35: gsang bar ngag gi thig le'i chos 'dor te /
T02D1347-1:277a-36: de nas rmi lam gyi gnas skabs chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-37: nor bur sems kyi thig le'i chos 'dor te de
T02D1347-1:277a-38: nas shin tu gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs chad par
T02D1347-1:277a-39: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du steng du yang rdul
T02D1347-1:277a-40: gyi khams kyi thig le rnams srog gis 'dor te
T02D1347-1:277a-41: 'gyur ro // / de nas lus dang ngag dang sems ni rnam par chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-42: 'pho ba'i dus su drug pa ye shes kyi khams 'dor ro //
T02D1347-1:277a-43: yan lag thams cad la khu ba 'og tu 'dor
T02D1347-1:277a-44: zhing rdul steng du 'dor te bzhi pa'i gnas skabs
T02D1347-1:277a-46: de ltar mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi ba'i dus des pa'o //
T02D1347-1:277a-47: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-1:277a-48: 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-1:277a-49: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-1:277a-50: las 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi skye ba dang 'gag
T02D1347-1:277a-51: pa'i rgyur gyur pa skad cig gi mtshan nyid dus
T02D1347-1:277a-52: kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste
